     heyādeyadṛśo yās tāḥ kṣīyante 'dhigate pade // Mo_2,13.5 //
"kṣīyante" līyante | parapadarūpatayaiva sphuranti iti yāvat || MoT_2,13.5 ||



     parityaktasamastehaṃ mano madhuravṛttimat /
     sarvataḥ sukham abhyeti candrabimba iva sthitam // Mo_2,13.6 //
"madhuravṛttimat" maitrīyuktam || MoT_2,13.6 ||


     api nirmananārambham apy astākhilakautukam /
     ātmany eva na māty antar indāv iva rasāyanam // Mo_2,13.7 //
"ātmany eva na māti" na prabhavati | atyantānandamayatvād iti bhāvaḥ | "mananārambha"rahitasya "kautukarahitasya" ca ānandena sv"ātmani" amānaṃ na yuktam iti lokaprasiddhir "api"śabdābhiprāyaḥ | rasāyanam amṛtam || MoT_2,13.7 ||


     na karotīndrajālāni nānudhāvati vāsanām /
     bālacāpalam utsṛjya pūrṇam eva virājate // Mo_2,13.8 //
"indrajālāni" mantrādiprabhāvena siddhāni ākāśagamanādīni | "vāsanām nānudhāvati" api tu tato nivṛttim eva karoti | bālavat cāpalam "bālacāpalam utsṛjya" | "pūrṇam" tṛptisahitaṃ yathā bhavati | tathā "virājate" || MoT_2,13.8 ||

ātmatattvāvalokanasyaiva pūrvoktāsu vṛttiṣu kāraṇatvaṃ gadyena kathayati
     evaṃvidhā hi vṛttaya ātmatattvāvalokanāl labhyante | nānyatas | tasmād vicāreṇātmaivānveṣṭavya upāsanīyo jñātavyo yāvajjīvaṃ puruṣena netarad iti // MoT_2,13.9 //
"itī"tyantaṃ | ṭīkā | "hi" yasmāt | "evaṃvidhāḥ" pūrvoktāḥ | vṛttayaḥ vyāpārāḥ | "ātmatattvasya" paramātmasvarūpasya | yad "avalokanaṃ" | tasmād eva | "puruṣeṇa labhyante" | "nānyataḥ" | "tasmād puruṣeṇa yāvajjīvaṃ vicāreṇātmaivānveṣṭavyaḥ" | kiṃrūpo 'sāv iti vimarśanīyaḥ | tataḥ "upāsanīyaḥ" | upāsanaṃ cātra avicchinnapravāheṇānusandhānaviṣayīkaraṇam eva jñeyam | tataḥ "jñātavyaḥ" | sthūladehādivyatirekena sthūladehavat niḥsaṃśayam ātmatattvena jñātavyaḥ | "itarat" sthūladehādi | "na" jñātavyam | "iti"śabdaḥ gadyasamāptau || MoT_2,13.9 ||


nanv ātmāvalokanaṃ kartavyatvena tvayā pratipāditaṃ | tadavalokanaṃ kathaṃ setsyatīty | atra padyenāha
     svānubhūteḥ suśāstrasya guroś caivaikavākyatā /
     yatrābhyāsena tenātmā santatenāvalokyate // Mo_2,13.10 //
"svā" nijā | yā "anubhūtiḥ" | tasyāḥ | "suśāstrasya" śobhanaśāstrasya | "guroḥ" sadguroś | "ca" iti trayasya | "yatra" yasmin abhyāse | "ekavākyatā" arthāt melanaṃ syāt | "santatenā"vicchinnena | "tenābhyāsena" karaṇena | puruṣeṇa kartrā | "ātmāvalokyate" || MoT_2,13.10 ||


     avahelitaśāstrārthair avajñātamahājanaiḥ /
     kaṣṭām apy āpadaṃ prāpto na mūḍhaiḥ samatām iyāt // Mo_2,13.11 //
svasthas tu katham "iyād" ity "api"śabdābhiprāyaḥ || MoT_2,13.11 ||



etatprasaṅgena maurkhyaṃ nindati
     na vyādhir na viṣaṃ nāpat tathā nāmāsti bhūtale /
     khedāya svaśarīrasthaṃ maurkhyam eva yathā nṛṇām // Mo_2,13.12 //
spaṣṭam || MoT_2,13.12 ||


     kiṃcitsaṃskṛtabuddhīnāṃ śravyaṃ śāstram idaṃ yathā /
     maurkhyāpahaṃ tathā śāstram anyad asti na kiṃcana // Mo_2,13.13 //
"kiṃcitsaṃskṛtabuddhīnām" padapadārthajñānām ity arthaḥ | "śravyam" śravaṇārham | "idaṃ" mokṣopāyākhyam | "maurkhyāpahaṃ" maurkhyam upahantīti "maurkhyāpaham" || MoT_2,13.13 ||


     idaṃ śravyaṃ sukhakaraṃ kathādṛṣṭāntasundaram /
     aviruddham aśeṣeṇa śāstravākyārthabandhunā // Mo_2,13.14 //
kathābhiḥ vakṣyamāṇāḥ dṛṣṭāntāḥ "kathādṛṣṭāntāḥ" | taiḥ "sundaram" | "śāstravākyānāṃ" yaḥ "arthaḥ" | sa eva "bandhuḥ" | tena "aviruddham" | śāstrārthānusārīty arthaḥ || MoT_2,13.14 ||


     āpado yā duruttārā yāś ca tucchāḥ kuyonayaḥ /
     tās tā maurkhyāt prasūyante khadirāt kaṇṭhakā iva // Mo_2,13.15 //
spaṣṭam || MoT_2,13.15 ||


     varaṃ śarāvahastasya caṇḍālāgāravīthiṣu /
     bhikṣārtham aṭanaṃ rāma na maurkhyahatajīvitam // Mo_2,13.16 //
"aṭanaṃ" bhramaṇam || MoT_2,13.16 ||


     imam ālokam āsādya mokṣopāyamayaṃ janaḥ /
     andhatām eti na punaḥ kaścin mohatamasy api // Mo_2,13.17 //
"ālokam" paratattvaprakāśakatvāt ālokasvarūpam || MoT_2,13.17 ||


     tāvan nayati saṃkocaṃ tṛṣṇā śyāmā narāmbujam /
     yāvad vivekasūryasya noditā vimalā prabhā // Mo_2,13.18 //
spaṣṭam || MoT_2,13.18 ||


     saṃsāraduḥkhamokṣārthaṃ mādṛśaiḥ saha bandhubhiḥ /
     svarūpam ātmano jñātvā guruśāstrapramāṇataḥ // Mo_2,13.19 //
"mādṛśaiḥ" sādhubhir ity arthaḥ | guruśāstrākhyaṃ yat "pramāṇaṃ" pramākaraṇaṃ | tasmāt "guruśāstrapramāṇataḥ" | "jñātve"ty asyānantaraṃ stheyam iti śeṣaḥ || MoT_2,13.19 ||



     jīvanmuktāś carantīha yathā hariharādayaḥ /
     yathā brahmarṣayaś cānye tathā vihara rāghava // Mo_2,13.20 //
"vihara" harṣāmarṣarahitatvena krīḍāṃ kuru || MoT_2,13.20 ||


     anantānīha duḥkhāni sukhaṃ kṣaṇalavopamam /
     nātaḥ sukheṣu badhnīyād dṛṣṭiṃ duḥkhānubandhiṣu // Mo_2,13.21 //
"duḥkhānubandhiṣu" duḥkhānuviddheṣu || MoT_2,13.21 ||


punaḥ kiṃ kāryam ity | atrāha
     yad anantam anāyāsaṃ tat padaṃ sārasiddhaye /
     sādhanīyaṃ prayatnena puruṣeṇa vijānatā // Mo_2,13.22 //
"anantam" trividhaparicchedarahitam | "anāyāsaṃ" āyāsasādhyatvābhāvāt | "sārasiddhaye" paramapuruṣārthasiddhaye | "sādhanīyaṃ" svopalabdhiviṣayatāṃ neyam | "vijānatā" kiṃcinmātrajñānayuktena mūrkhasyātrānadhikaratvāt || MoT_2,13.22 ||


     ta eva puruṣārthasya bhājanaṃ puruṣottamāḥ /
     anuttamapadālambi mano yeṣāṃ gatajvaram // Mo_2,13.23 //
avidyamāna uttamaḥ yasmāt tat "anuttamam" niratiśayam iti yāvat | tādṛśaṃ yat "padam" | tat "ālambate" iti tādṛśam || MoT_2,13.23 ||


     saṃbhogāśanamātreṣu rājyādiṣu sukheṣu ye /
     saṃtuṣṭā duṣṭamanaso viddhi tān andhadundubhān // Mo_2,13.24 //
"andhadundubhān" andharājilān | asamyag darśitvād ity arthaḥ || MoT_2,13.24 ||



     ye śaṭheṣu duranteṣu duṣkṛtārambhaśāliṣu /
     dviṣatsu mitrarūpeṣu bhaktā vai bhogabhogiṣu // Mo_2,13.25 //
     te yānti durgamād durgaṃ duḥkhād duḥkhaṃ bhayād bhayam /
     narakān narakaṃ mūḍhā mohamantharabuddhayaḥ // Mo_2,13.26 //
"mitrarūpeṣu dviṣatsu" ā mukhe sukhakāritvāt "mohamantharā" mohanirbharā | "buddhiḥ" yeṣāṃ te | tādṛśāḥ || MoT_2,13.25-26 ||


     parasparavināśotke śreyasyau na kadācana /
     sukhaduḥkhadaśe rāma taḍitprasarabhaṅgure // Mo_2,13.27 //
spaṣṭam || MoT_2,13.27 ||


     ye viraktā mahātmānaḥ suviviktā bhavādṛśaḥ /
     puruṣān viddhi tān vandyān bhogamokṣaikabhāginaḥ // Mo_2,13.28 //
"bhogabhāktvaṃ" caiṣāṃ pravāhagatam eva jñeyaṃ | na yatnasādhitam || MoT_2,13.28 ||


     vivekaṃ param āśritya vairāgyābhyāsayogataḥ /
     saṃsārasaritaṃ ghorām imām āpadam uttaret // Mo_2,13.29 //
"abhyāsaḥ" sacchāstrābhyāsaḥ | "āpadam" āpadrūpām || MoT_2,13.29 ||



     na suptavyaṃ tu saṃsāramāyāsv iha hi jānatā /
     viṣamūrcchanasaṃmohadāyinīṣu vivekinā // Mo_2,13.30 //
"na suptavyam" avahelā na kartavyā || MoT_2,13.30 ||


     saṃsāram imam āsādya yas tiṣṭhaty avahelayā /
     jvalitasya gṛhasyoccaiḥ śete tārṇasya so 'ntare // Mo_2,13.31 //
"tārṇasya" tṛṇanirmitasya || MoT_2,13.31 ||


     yat prāpya na nivartante yad āsādya na śocyate /
     tat padaṃ śemuṣīlabhyam asty evātra na saṃśayaḥ // Mo_2,13.32 //
"śemuṣīlabhyam eva" buddhilabhyam eva | na tu bāhyayatnalabhyam || MoT_2,13.32 ||


nanu yadi tat padaṃ nāsti tat kiṃ śemuṣyā labhyate ity | atrāha
     nāsti cet tad vicāreṇa doṣaḥ ko bhavatāṃ bhavet /
     asti cet tat samuttīrṇā bhaviṣyatha bhavārṇavāt // Mo_2,13.33 //
spaṣṭam || MoT_2,13.33 ||


     pravṛttiḥ puruṣasyeha mokṣopāyavicāraṇe /
     yadā bhavaty āśu tadā mokṣabhāgī sa ucyate // Mo_2,13.34 //
spaṣṭam || MoT_2,13.34 ||


     anapāyi nirāśaṅkaṃ svāsthyaṃ vigatavibhramam /
     na vinā kevalībhāvaṃ vidyate bhuvanatraye // Mo_2,13.35 //
"svāsthyam" svasthatā | "kevalībhāvaṃ vinā" advitīyatāṃ vinā || MoT_2,13.35 ||


     tatprāptāv uttamaprāptau na kleśa upayujyate /
     na mitrāṇy upakurvanti na dhanāni na bāndhavāḥ // Mo_2,13.36 //
"tatprāptau" kevalībhāvaprāptau | "kleśaḥ" śārīrikaḥ kleśaḥ || MoT_2,13.36 ||


     na hastapādacalanaṃ na deśāntarasaṃgamaḥ /
     kleśātiśayasādhyo vā na tīrthāyatanāśrayaḥ // Mo_2,13.37 //
asminn arthe "hastapādā"di"calanaṃ na" bhavati | "deśāntarasaṃgamaḥ" ca "na" bhavati | ayam arthaḥ "kleśātiśayasādhyaḥ na" bhavati | "tīrthāyatanāśrayaḥ" ca "na" bhavati || MoT_2,13.37 ||



     puruṣārthaikasādhyena vāsanaikārthakarmaṇā /
     kevalaṃ tan manomātrajayenāsādyate padam // Mo_2,13.38 //
puruṣeṇa "tat" kevalībhāvākhyaṃ "padam" | "evalam manomātrajayena āsādyate" prāpyate | "manomātrajayena" kathaṃbhūtena | "puruṣārthena" pauruṣeṇa | "ekam" kevalaṃ "sādhyena" | punaḥ kathaṃbhūtena "vāsanaikārthakarmaṇā" | "vāsanā" bhāvanā | sā eva "ekārthaḥ" | tasya "karmaṇā" | bhāvanāmātrasādhyenety arthaḥ || MoT_2,13.38 ||


     vivekamātrasādhyaṃ tadvicāraikāntaniścayam /
     tyajatā duḥkhajālāni nareṇa tad avāpyate // Mo_2,13.39 //
"tadvicāreṇa" tadviṣayeṇa vivekena | "ekaṃ" kevalaṃ | "niścayaḥ" yasya | tam | vicāraniśceyam ity arthaḥ | "tat" kevalībhāvākhyaṃ padam || MoT_2,13.39 ||


     sukhasevyāsanasthena tadvicāravatā svayam /
     na śocyate padaṃ prāpya na ca bhūyo 'bhijāyate // Mo_2,13.40 //
"tadvicāravatā" kevalībhāvavicārayuktena | tat "padaṃ" kevalībhāvākhyaṃ padam || MoT_2,13.40 ||


     tat samastasukhāsārasīmāntaṃ sādhavo viduḥ /
     tad anuttamaniṣṣyandaṃ param āhū rasāyanam // Mo_2,13.41 //
spaṣṭam || MoT_2,13.41 ||


     kṣayitvāt sarvabhāvānāṃ svargamānuṣyayor dvayoḥ /
     sukhaṃ nāsty eva salilaṃ mṛgatṛṣṇāsv ivaitayoḥ // Mo_2,13.42 //
"svargamānuṣyayoḥ" svarlokamanuṣyalokayoḥ || MoT_2,13.42 ||


     ato manojayaś cintyaḥ śamasaṃtoṣasādhanaḥ /
     anantaśamasaṃbhogas tasmād ānanda āpyate // Mo_2,13.43 //
"ataḥ" kāraṇāt | puruṣeṇa "manojayaḥ cintyaḥ" | kathaṃbhūtaḥ | "śamasaṃtoṣau sādhanaṃ" yasya | tādṛśaḥ puruṣaḥ | "tasmāt" manojayāt | "anantaśamasya saṃbhogaḥ" camatkāraḥ | śamāsvādarūpaḥ iti yāvat | "ānandaḥ āpyate" prāpyate || MoT_2,13.43 ||
     jīvatā gacchatā caiva bhramatā patatā tathā /
     rakṣasā dānavenāpi devena puruṣeṇa vā // Mo_2,13.44 //
     manaḥpraśamanodbhūtaṃ tat prāpya paramaṃ sukhaṃ /
     vikāsiśamapuṣpasya vivekoccataroḥ phalam // Mo_2,13.45 //
     vyavahārapareṇāpi kāryavṛndam acinvatā /
     bhānunevāmbarasthena nojjhyate na ca vāñchyate // Mo_2,13.46 //
"jīvatā gacchatā bhramatā" | atha "patatā" | upalakṣaṇaṃ caitat | sarvāḥ kriyāḥ kurvateti yāvat | "rakṣasā dānavenāpi devena puruṣeṇa vā manaḥpraśamanodbhūtaṃ" tathā "vikāsiśamapuṣpasya" "vivekoccataroḥ" phalam | tat paramaṃ sukham nirvāṇākhyaṃ sukhaṃ | "prāpyāmbarasthena bhānunā iva nojjhyate na ca vāñchyate" sūryavat upekṣām eva sarvatra kriyate ity arthaḥ | rakṣaḥprabhṛtinā kathaṃbhūtena | "vyavahārapareṇāpi kāryavṛndam" kāryasamūham | "acinvatā" nāhaṃkarteti niścayāt svakṛtatvenānanubhavatā || MoT_2,13.44-46 ||



     manaḥ praśāntam atyacchaṃ viśrāntaṃ gatavibhramam /
     anīhaṃ vigatābhīṣṭaṃ nābhivāñchati nojjhati // Mo_2,13.47 //
"anīham" vikalpākhyaceṣṭārahitam | "vigatābhīṣṭam" abhīṣṭam idam iti niścayarahitam | pravāhāgatam upekṣayā eva karotīti bhāvaḥ || MoT_2,13.47 ||


pūrvataraṃ prakṛtānāṃ śamādidvārapālānāṃ nirṇayaṃ prastauti
     mokṣadvāre dvārapālān imāñ śṛṇu yathākramam /
     yeṣām ekatamāsaktyā mokṣadvāre praviśyate // Mo_2,13.48 //
"ekatamāsaktyā" ekatamāsevanena || MoT_2,13.48 ||



tatrāpi prathamoddiṣṭaṃ śamaṃ nirūpayati
     duḥkhadoṣadaśā dīrghā saṃsāramarumaṇḍalī /
     jantoḥ śītalatām eti śītalena śamāmbunā // Mo_2,13.49 //
duḥkhadoṣarūpā daśā yasyāṃ sā "duḥkhadoṣadaśā" || MoT_2,13.49 ||


     śamenāsādyate śreyaḥ śamo hi paramaṃ padam /
     śamaḥ śivaṃ śamaḥ śāntiḥ śamo bhrāntinivāraṇam // Mo_2,13.50 //
"paramaṃ padam" cinmātrākhyam utkṛṣṭaṃ sthānam || MoT_2,13.50 ||


     puṃsaḥ praśamatṛptasya śītalācchatarātmanaḥ /
     śamatoṣitacittasya śatrur apy eti mitratām // Mo_2,13.51 //
dveṣeṇaiva hi śatruḥ śatruḥ bhavati | sa ca tasya nāstīti tasya "śatruḥ mitratām etī"ti bhāvaḥ || MoT_2,13.51 ||


     śamacandramasā yeṣām āśayaḥ samalaṃkṛtaḥ /
     kṣīrābdhīnām ivodeti teṣāṃ paramaśuddhatā // Mo_2,13.52 //
"paramaśuddhatā" vāsanākhyamalarāhityam || MoT_2,13.52 ||



     hṛtkuśeśayakośeṣu yeṣāṃ śamakuśeśayam /
     satāṃ vikasitaṃ te hi dvihṛtpadmāḥ samā hareḥ // Mo_2,13.53 //
"harer dvihṛtpadmatvaṃ" nābhisthasya padmasya sthitatvāj jñeyam || MoT_2,13.53 ||



     śamaśrīḥ śobhate yeṣāṃ mukhendāv akalaṅkite /
     te 'mī kulendavo vandyāḥ saundaryavijitendavaḥ // Mo_2,13.54 //
"akalaṅkitatvam" evātra indujaye hetuḥ || MoT_2,13.54 ||


     trailokyodaravartinyo nānandāya tathā śriyaḥ /
     sāmrājyasaṃpatpratimā yathā śamavibhūtayaḥ // Mo_2,13.55 //
spaṣṭam || MoT_2,13.55 ||


     yāni duḥkhāni yās tṛṣṇā duḥsahā ye durādhayaḥ /
      tat sarvaṃ śāntacetassu tamo 'rkeṣv iva naśyati // Mo_2,13.56 //
spaṣṭam || MoT_2,13.56 ||


     mano hi sarvabhūtānāṃ prasādam anugacchati /
     na tathendau yathā śānte jane janitakautukam // Mo_2,13.57 //
"prasādam" prasannatām || MoT_2,13.57 ||


     śamaśālini sauhārdavati sarveṣu jantuṣu /
     sujane paramaṃ tattvaṃ svayam eva prasīdati // Mo_2,13.58 //
"paramaṃ tattvam" paramātmatattvaṃ | "svayam evā"yatnam eva | "prasīdati" svarūpadarśanākhyaṃ prasādaṃ karotīty arthaḥ || MoT_2,13.58 ||



     mātarīva paraṃ yānti viṣamāṇi mṛdūni ca /
     viśvāsam iha bhūtāni sarvāṇi śamaśālini // Mo_2,13.59 //
"viṣamāṇi" hiṃsāni | "mṛdūni" komalāni || MoT_2,13.59 ||



     na rasāyanapānena na lakṣmyāliṅganena ca /
     tathā sukham avāpnoti śamenāntar yathā janaḥ // Mo_2,13.60 //
"antaḥ" manasi || MoT_2,13.60 ||


     sarvādhivyādhivalitaṃ krāntaṃ tṛṣṇāvaratrayā /
     manaḥ śamāmṛtāsekaiḥ samāśvāsaya rāghava // Mo_2,13.61 //
"samāśvāsaya" śītalaya || MoT_2,13.61 ||



     yat karoṣi yad aśnāsi śamaśītalayā dhiyā /
     tat te 'tisvadate svādu netarat tāntamānasam // Mo_2,13.62 //
"svadate" rocate | camatkāraṃ karotīti yāvat | "tāntam" mlāniyuktaṃ kṛtaṃ | "mānasaṃ" yena tat || MoT_2,13.62 ||



     śamāmṛtarasāsnātaṃ mano yām eti nirvṛtim /
     chinnāny api tayāṅgāni manye rohanti rāghava // Mo_2,13.63 //
"śamāmṛtarasāsnātaṃ manaḥ yāṃ nirvṛtiṃ eti" | he "rāghavā"haṃ "manye" | "tayā" nirvṛtyā | "chinnāny api aṅgāni rohanti" || MoT_2,13.63 ||



     na piśācā na rakṣāṃsi na daityā na ca śatravaḥ /
     na ca vyāghrabhujaṅgādyā dviṣanti śamaśālinam // Mo_2,13.64 //
spaṣṭam || MoT_2,13.64 ||


     susaṃnaddhasamastāṅgaṃ praśamāmṛtavarmaṇā /
     vedhayanti na duḥkhāni śarā vajraśilāṃ iva // Mo_2,13.65 //
"vedhayanti" tāḍayanti || MoT_2,13.65 ||


     na tathā rājate rājā mānyāntaḥpurasaṃsthitaḥ /
     samayā svasthayā vṛttyā yathopaśamaśobhitaḥ // Mo_2,13.66 //
"vṛttyā" vyāpāreṇa || MoT_2,13.66 ||



     prāṇāt priyataraṃ dṛṣṭvā tuṣṭim eti na tāṃ janaḥ /
     yām āyāti janaṃ śāntam avalokya samāśayam // Mo_2,13.67 //
"samāśayam" samacetasam || MoT_2,13.67 ||



     samayā śamaśālinyā vṛttyā yaḥ sādhu vartate /
     abhinanditayā loke jīvatīha sa netaraḥ // Mo_2,13.68 //
"vartate" tiṣṭhati | "itaraḥ" aśāntaḥ || MoT_2,13.68 ||


     anuddhatamanāḥ śāntaḥ sādhu karma karoti yat /
     tat sarvam abhinandanti tasyemā bhūtajātayaḥ // Mo_2,13.69 //
"abhinandanti" stuvanti || MoT_2,13.69 ||


śāntasvarūpanirṇayadvāreṇa śamasvarūpaṃ niścinoti
     śrutvā spṛṣṭvā ca dṛṣṭvā ca bhuktvā ghrātvā śubhāśubham /
     na hṛṣyati glāyati yaḥ sa śānta iti kathyate // Mo_2,13.70 //
upekṣā eva śāntir iti bhāvaḥ || MoT_2,13.70 ||


     yaḥ samaḥ sarvabhāveṣu nābhivāñchati nojjhati /
     jitvendriyāṇi yatnena sa śānta iti kathyate // Mo_2,13.71 //
spaṣṭam || MoT_2,13.71 ||


     tuṣārakarabimbācchaṃ mano yasya nirākulam /
     maraṇotsavayuddheṣu sa śānta iti kathyate // Mo_2,13.72 //
spaṣṭam || MoT_2,13.72 ||


     sthito 'pi na sthita iva na hṛṣyati na kupyati /
     yaḥ suṣuptamanāḥ svasthaḥ sa śānta iti kathyate // Mo_2,13.73 //
"suṣuptamanāḥ" harṣāmarṣānusandhānarahitaḥ || MoT_2,13.73 ||



     amṛtasyandasubhagā yasya sarvajanaṃ prati /
     dṛṣṭiḥ prasarati prītā sa śānta iti kathyate // Mo_2,13.74 //
spaṣṭam || MoT_2,13.74 ||


     spaṣṭāvadātayā buddhyā yathaivāntas tathā bahiḥ /
     dṛśyante yasya kāryāṇi sa śānta iti kathyate // Mo_2,13.75 //
kapaṭarāhityād iti bhāvaḥ || MoT_2,13.75 ||


     apy āpatsu durantāsu kalpānteṣu dahatsv api /
     tucchehaṃ na mano yasya sa śānta iti kathyate // Mo_2,13.76 //
"tuccheham" tucchopāyaparam || MoT_2,13.76 ||


     yo 'ntaḥ śītalatāṃ yāto yo bhāveṣu na majjati /
     vyavahārī na saṃmūḍhaḥ sa śānta iti kathyate // Mo_2,13.77 //
"na majjati" rāgodrekeṇāsakto na bhavati | "vyavahārī" vyavahārakārī | "na saṃmūḍhaḥ" na vyavahārarahitaḥ | vyavahārarahitasya hi amajjanaṃ vyavahārābhāvakṛtam eva na śāntikṛtam || MoT_2,13.77 ||



     ākāśasadṛśī yasya nityaṃ svavyavahāriṇaḥ /
     kalaṅkam eti na matiḥ sa śānta iti kathyate // Mo_2,13.78 //
"svaḥ" nijaḥ | "vyavahāraḥ" asyāstīti tādṛśasya || MoT_2,13.78 ||


     tapasviṣu bahujñeṣu yājakeṣu nṛpeṣu ca /
     balavatsu guṇāḍhyeṣu śamavān eva rājate // Mo_2,13.79 //
spaṣṭam || MoT_2,13.79 ||


     śamasaṃsaktamanasāṃ mahatāṃ guṇaśālinām /
     udeti nirvṛtiś cittāj jyotsneva himarociṣaḥ // Mo_2,13.80 //
spaṣṭam || MoT_2,13.80 ||


     sīmānto guṇapūgānāṃ pauruṣaikāntabhūṣaṇam /
     saṃkaṭeṣv abhayasthānaṃ śamaḥ śrīmān virājate // Mo_2,13.81 //
spaṣṭam || MoT_2,13.81 ||


sargāntaślokena śamanirūpaṇaṃ samāpayati
          śamam amṛtam ahāryam āryajuṣṭaṃ
          param avalambya padaṃ paraṃ prayātāḥ /
          raghutanaya yathā mahānubhāvāḥ
          kramam anupālaya siddhaye tam eva // Mo_2,13.82 //
he "raghutanaya" | "mahānubhāvāḥ" puruṣāḥ | "amṛtam" amṛtarūpam | "ahāryam" anāśyam "āryajuṣṭam" |" śamaṃ" pūrvoktasvarūpaṃ śamaṃ "avalambya" | "paraṃ" padaṃ paracitsvarūpam utkṛṣṭaṃ sthānaṃ | yathā "prayātāḥ" | tvam "tam" tathāvidham | "kramam siddhaye anupālaya" | iti śivam || MoT_2,13.82 ||


iti śrībhāskarakaṇṭhaviracitāyāṃ śrīmokṣopāyaṭīkāyāṃ mumukṣuprakaraṇe trayodaśaḥ sargaḥ || 2,13 ||


************************************************************************

oṃ vivekanirṇayaṃ prastauti
     śāstrāvabodhāmalayā dhiyā paramapūtayā | /
     kartavyaḥ kāraṇajñena vicāro 'niśam ātmanaḥ // Mo_2,14.1 //"
kāraṇajñena" kiṃ | kena saṃpadyate iti jānatā puruṣeṇa | "dhiyā ātmanaḥ vicāraḥ aniśam kartavyaḥ" || MoT_2,14.1 ||


nanu vicāreṇa kiṃ setsyati ity | atrāha
     vicārāt tīkṣṇatām etya dhīḥ paśyati paraṃ padam /
     dīrghasaṃsārarogasya vicāro hi mahauṣadham // Mo_2,14.2 //
"param padam" śuddhacinmātrākhyaṃ mahāsthānam || MoT_2,14.2 ||


     āpadvanam anantehāparipallavitākṛti /
     vicārakrakacacchinnaṃ naiva bhūyaḥ prarohati // Mo_2,14.3 //
"anantāḥ" yāḥ "īhāḥ" ceṣṭāḥ | tābhiḥ "paripallavitā" puṣṭībhūtā | "ākṛtiḥ" yasya tat || MoT_2,14.3 ||



     moheṣu bandhunāśeṣu saṃkaṭeṣu bhrameṣu ca /
     sarveṣv eva mahāprājña vicāro hi satāṃ gatiḥ // Mo_2,14.4 //
"gatiḥ" śaraṇam || MoT_2,14.4 ||


     na vicāraṃ vinā kaścid upāyo 'sti vipacchame /
     vicārād aśubhaṃ tyaktvā śubham āyāti dhīḥ satām // Mo_2,14.5 //
spaṣṭam || MoT_2,14.5 ||


     balaṃ buddhiś ca tejaś ca pratipattiḥ kriyāphalam /
     phalanty etāni sarvāṇi vicāreṇaiva dhīmataḥ // Mo_2,14.6 //
"pratipattiḥ" jñānam | avivekena tu kṛtāni "etāni" anartham evotpādayantīti bhāvaḥ || MoT_2,14.6 ||



     yuktāyuktamahādīpam abhivāñchitasādhakam /
     sphāraṃ vicāram āśritya saṃsārajaladhiṃ taret // Mo_2,14.7 //
"yuktāyuktamahādīpaṃ" idaṃ yuktaṃ idaṃ tv ayuktam iti prakāśakam ity arthaḥ | "sphāraṃ" vistīrṇam || MoT_2,14.7 ||


     ālūnahṛdayāmbhojaṃ mahāmohamataṅgajam /
     vidārayati śuddhātmā vicārodārakesarī // Mo_2,14.8 //
"vidārayati" vināśayati || MoT_2,14.8 ||


     mūḍhāḥ kālavaśeneha yad gatāḥ paramaṃ padam /
     tad vicārapradīpasya vijṛmbhitam anuttamam // Mo_2,14.9 //
"kālena" hi "mūḍhā" api śuddhacinmātrākhyaṃ "paramaṃ padaṃ" prāpnuvanti | "vijṛmbhitam" vilasitam | "anuttamam" niratiśayam || MoT_2,14.9 ||


     rājyāni saṃpadaḥ sphāro bhogo mokṣaś ca śāśvataḥ /
     vicārakalpavṛkṣasya phalāny etāni rāghava // Mo_2,14.10 //
spaṣṭam || MoT_2,14.10 ||



     yā vivekavilāsinyo matayo mahatām iha /
     na tā vipadi majjanti tumbakānīva vāriṇi // Mo_2,14.11 //
vivekavilāsaḥ āsām astīti "vivekavilāsinyaḥ" || MoT_2,14.11 ||


     vicārodayahāriṇyā dhiyā vyavaharanti ye /
     phalānām atyudārāṇāṃ bhājanaṃ hi bhavanti te // Mo_2,14.12 //
"vicārodayena hāriṇyā" manoharayā || MoT_2,14.12 ||


     mūrkhahṛtkānanasthānām āśāprasararodhinām /
     avicārakarañjānāṃ mañjaryo duḥkharītayaḥ // Mo_2,14.13 //
"āśā" mokṣāśā | tasyāḥ yaḥ "prasaraḥ" | taṃ rundhantīti tādṛśānām dik"prasararodhināṃ" ca | "karañjānāṃ" kaṇṭakavṛkṣāṇām | "duḥkharītayaḥ" duḥkharacanāḥ || MoT_2,14.13 ||



     kajjalakṣodamalinā madirāmodadhāriṇī /
     avicāramayī nidrā yātu te rāghava kṣayam // Mo_2,14.14 //
"kajjalakṣodena" mantrasaṃskṛtena | "kajjalakṣodena malinā" ghanā | kajjalakṣodavat "malinā" cātyantakāluṣyāt | "madirā modaṃ dhārayatī"ti tādṛśī | madirāmodenāpi "nidrā" ghanībhavati | "avicāramayī" avicārasvarūpā tām eva "kṣayaṃ" nayeti bhāvaḥ || MoT_2,14.14 ||


     mahāpady api dīrgheṣu sadvicāraparo naraḥ /
     na nimajjati moheṣu tejorāśis tamassv iva // Mo_2,14.15 //
"moheṣu" kiṃ karomīty evaṃrūpeṣu || MoT_2,14.15 ||



     mānase sarasi svacche vicārakamalotkaraḥ /
     nūnaṃ vikasito yasya himavān iva bhāti saḥ // Mo_2,14.16 //
"mānase sarasi" hṛdayākhye sarasi mānasākhye sarasīti ca || MoT_2,14.16 ||


     vicāravikalā yasya matir māndyam upeyuṣaḥ /
     tasyodety aśaniś candrān mudhā yakṣaḥ śiśor iva // Mo_2,14.17 //
"vicāravikalā" vicārarahitā | "māndyaṃ" jāḍyaṃ | "candrāt" citsūryapratibimbarūpatvena candratulyāt saṃsārāt | "aśaniḥ" bhāvābhāvakṛtaharṣāmarṣarūpaṃ vajram āścaryaṃ ca candrād aśaner utpādaḥ || MoT_2,14.17 ||



     duḥkhaṣaṇḍakavalmīkaṃ vipannavalatāmadhuḥ /
     rāma dūre parityājyo nirviveko narādhamaḥ // Mo_2,14.18 //
"narādhamaḥ" kiṃ | "duḥkhaḥ ṣaṇḍakānāṃ valmīkam" | valmīke hi kaṇṭakaṣaṇḍakāni bhavanti | punaḥ kaḥ | "vipad" eva "navalatā" | tasyāḥ "madhuḥ" vasantaḥ || MoT_2,14.18 ||


     ye kecana durārambhā durācārā durādhayaḥ /
     avicāreṇa te bhānti vetālās tamasā yathā // Mo_2,14.19 //
"durārambhāḥ" kutsitāḥ kāryārambhāḥ || MoT_2,14.19 ||


     avicāriṇam ekāntajaraddrumasadharmakam /
     akṣamaṃ sādhukāryeṣu dūre kuru raghūdvaha // Mo_2,14.20 //
"ekānte" janarahite deśe | sthitaḥ "jaraddrumaḥ" | tasya "sadharmakam" sadṛśam | "sādhukāryeṣu" cittanirodhādiṣu | phaladānena paropakārarūpeṣu ca śubhakāryeṣu || MoT_2,14.20 ||



     viviktaṃ hi mano jantor āśāvaivaśyavarjitam /
     parāṃ nirvṛtim abhyeti pūrṇaś candra ivātmani // Mo_2,14.21 //
"viviktam" vivekayuktam | "āśāvaivaśyavarjitam" iti viśeṣaṇadvāreṇa hetuḥ | āśāvaivaśyasyaiva nirvṛtirodhakatvāt || MoT_2,14.21 ||


     vivekitoditā dehaṃ sarvaṃ śītalayaty alam /
     alaṃkaroti cātyantaṃ jyotsneva bhuvanam navā // Mo_2,14.22 //
"navā" śaratkālīnā || MoT_2,14.22 ||


     paramārthapatākāyā dhiyo dhavalacāmaram /
     vicāro rājate janto rajanyām iva candramāḥ // Mo_2,14.23 //
"paramārthasya" śuddhacinmātratattvākhyaparamārthasya | "patākāyāḥ" pradarśakatvasāmānyena cihṇabhūtapatākārūpāyāḥ "dhiyaḥ" | "dhavalacāmaram" śobhādāyakatvena dhavalacāmararūpam || MoT_2,14.23 ||



     vicāracāravo bhāvā bhāsayanto diśo daśa /
     bhānti bhāskaravad bhagnabhūyobhavabhayāmayāḥ // Mo_2,14.24 //
"bhāvāḥ" manuṣyādirūpāḥ padārthāḥ | "bhāvāḥ" kathaṃbhūtāḥ | "bhagnāḥ bhūyāṃsi bhavabhayāni" ev"āmayāḥ" yaiḥ te | "bhāskaro" 'pi "daśa diśaḥ" bhāsayati || MoT_2,14.24 ||


     bālasya svamanomohakalpitaḥ prāṇahārakaḥ /
     rātrau tamasi vetālo vicāreṇa vilīyate // Mo_2,14.25 //
spaṣṭam || MoT_2,14.25 ||


     sarva eva jagadbhāvā avicāreṇa cāravaḥ /
     avidyamānasadbhāvā vicāraviśarāravaḥ // Mo_2,14.26 //
"sarva eva jagadbhāvāḥ" jagatpadārthāḥ | "avicāreṇa" vicārarāhityena | "cāravaḥ" bhavanti | kathaṃbhūtāḥ | "avidyamānasadbhāvāḥ" | ata eva ca "vicāraviśarāravaś" ca vicārāsahatvāt || MoT_2,14.26 ||



     puṃso nijamanomohakalpito 'nalpaduḥkhadaḥ /
     saṃsāraciravetālo vicāreṇa vilīyate // Mo_2,14.27 //
spaṣṭam || MoT_2,14.27 ||


     samasvacchaṃ nirābādham anantamananāśrayam /
     viddhīmaṃ kevalībhāvaṃ vicāro 'grataroḥ phalam // Mo_2,14.28 //
samaṃ ca tat svacchaṃ "samasvacchaṃ" | "nirābādham" kenāpi pramāṇena bādhayitum aśakyam | "anantasyā"paricchinnasya svātmatattvasya | yat "mananam" parāmarśaḥ | tasy"āśrayam" lakṣaṇayā sādhakam || MoT_2,14.28 ||


     acalasthitinodāraprakaṭābhogatejasā /
     tena niṣkāmatodeti śītatevoditendunā // Mo_2,14.29 //
"udāraprakaṭābhogaṃ" udbhaṭaprakaṭavistāraṃ | "tejaḥ" yasya | tādṛśena | "niṣkāmatā" kāmanārāhityam | "uditaś" cāsāv "induḥ" | tena || MoT_2,14.29 ||


nanu niṣkāmatayā kiṃ setsyatīty | atrāha
     cintājvaramahauṣadhyā sādhuś cittaniṣaṇṇayā /
     tayottamatvapradayā nābhivāñchati nojjhati // Mo_2,14.30 //
"tayā" niṣkāmatayā | "nābhivāñchati nojjhati" sarvatropekṣām eva bhajate ity arthaḥ || MoT_2,14.30 ||


punaḥ kiṃ karotīty | atrāha
     tatsadālambanaṃ cetaḥ sphāram ābhāsam āgatam /
     nāstam eti na codeti kham ivātitatāntaram // Mo_2,14.31 //
sā niṣkāmatā "sadā ālambanam" āśrayo yasya | tat "tatsadālambanam" | tathā "sphāraṃ" sphuraṇaśīlaṃ | "ābhāsam āgatam" vivekayuktaṃ jātam ity arthaḥ || MoT_2,14.31 ||


     na jahāti na cādatte nottāmyati na śāmyati /
     kevalaṃ sākṣivat paśyañ jagad ātmani tiṣṭhati // Mo_2,14.32 //
"nottāmyati" na kṣubhyati || MoT_2,14.32 ||



     na ca śāmyati nāpy antar nāpi bāhye 'vatiṣṭhati /
     na ca naiṣkarmyam ādatte na ca karmāṇi majjati // Mo_2,14.33 //
sarvatropekṣayaiva vartate iti bhāvaḥ || MoT_2,14.33 ||


     upekṣate gataṃ vastu saṃprāptam anuvartate /
     na kṣubdho nāti cākṣubdho bhāti pūrṇa ivārṇavaḥ // Mo_2,14.34 //
"anuvartate" niranusandhānam pravartate | "ati" atiśayena || MoT_2,14.34 ||


     evaṃrūpeṇa manasā mahātmāno mahāśayāḥ /
     jīvanmuktā jagaty asmin viharanti hi yoginaḥ // Mo_2,14.35 //
spaṣṭam || MoT_2,14.35 ||


     uṣitvā suciraṃ kālaṃ dhīrās te yāvadīpsitam /
     tanum ante parityajya yānti kevalatāṃ tatām // Mo_2,14.36 //
"kevalatām" videhamuktatām | "yāvadīpsitam" ity anena sarvam eva bhagavatkṛtam teṣām īpsitam evāstīti sūcitam || MoT_2,14.36 ||


     ko 'haṃ kasya ca saṃsāra ity āpady api dhīmatā /
     cintanīyaṃ prayatnena sapratīkāram ātmanā // Mo_2,14.37 //
kim uta vaktavyaṃ saṃpadīty "api"śabdābhiprāyaḥ | "sapratīkāram" pratīkārasahitam | na tu cintanamātreṇaiva | pratīkāraś cātra bhogatyāga eva jñeyaḥ || MoT_2,14.37 ||


     kāryasaṃkaṭasandehaṃ rājā jānāti rāghava /
     niṣphalaṃ saphalaṃ vāpi vicāreṇaiva nānyathā // Mo_2,14.38 //
bahir api vicārasyaiva sāmrājyam iti bhāvaḥ || MoT_2,14.38 ||


     vedavedāntasiddhāntasthitayaḥ sthitikāraṇam /
     nirṇīyante vicāreṇa dīpeneva bhuvo niśi // Mo_2,14.39 //
vedavedāntarūpāḥ sthitayaḥ maryādāḥ "vedavedāntasthitayaḥ" | "sthitikāraṇam" saṃsāramaryādākāraṇabhūtāḥ || MoT_2,14.39 ||



     anaṣṭam andhakāreṣu bahutejassv ajihmitam /
     paśyaty api vyavahitaṃ vicāraś cārulocanam // Mo_2,14.40 //
"ajihmitam" tejo'bhimukhe hi cakṣuṣi pratīghātena jihmitatvaṃ parivartitatvaṃ bhavati | tac cātra nāstīty arthaḥ || MoT_2,14.40 ||


     vivekāndho hi jātyandhaḥ śocyaḥ sarvasya durmatiḥ /
     divyacakṣur vivekātmā jayaty akhilavastuṣu // Mo_2,14.41 //
"sarvasya śocyaḥ" sarvaiḥ śocanīya ity arthaḥ | "vivekaḥ ātmā" pradhānaṃ yasya saḥ "vivekātmā" vivekānvita ity arthaḥ | "jayati" sarvotkarṣeṇa vartate ity arthaḥ || MoT_2,14.41 ||


     paramātmamayī pālyā mahānandaikasādhanī /
     kṣaṇam ekaṃ parityājyā na vicāracamatkṛtiḥ // Mo_2,14.42 //
"pālyā" rakṣaṇīyā || MoT_2,14.42 ||


     vicāracāruḥ puruṣo mahatām api rocate /
     paripakvaṃ camatkāri sahakāraphalaṃ yathā // Mo_2,14.43 //
spaṣṭam || MoT_2,14.43 ||


     vicārakāntamatayo nānekeṣu punaḥ punaḥ /
     luṭhanti duḥkhaśvabhreṣu jñātordhvagatayo narāḥ // Mo_2,14.44 //
"jñātāḥ" adhigatā | "ūrdhve" uttīrṇe cinmātre | "gatiḥ" yaite || MoT_2,14.44 ||


     na virauti tathā rogī nānarthaśatajarjaraḥ /
     avicāravinaṣṭātmā yathājñaḥ pariroditi // Mo_2,14.45 //
"nānarthaśatajarjara" ity atra "ca"śabdo 'dhyāhāryaḥ | "avicāreṇā"vivekena "vinaṣṭaḥ" vismṛtaḥ | "ātmā" pāramārthikaṃ svarūpaṃ yasya | tādṛśaḥ || MoT_2,14.45 ||


     varaṃ kardamakīṭatvaṃ śvabhrakaṇṭakatā varam /
     varam andhaguhāhitvaṃ na narasyāvicāritā // Mo_2,14.46 //
spaṣṭam || MoT_2,14.46 ||


     sarvānarthanijāvāsaṃ sarvasādhutiraskṛtam /
     sarvadauḥsthityasīmāntam avicāraṃ parityajet // Mo_2,14.47 //
"sarve" ye "anarthāḥ" | teṣāṃ "nijaḥ" svakīyaḥ | "āvāsaḥ" sarvānarthaśrayam ity arthaḥ || MoT_2,14.47 ||


     nityaṃ vicārayuktena bhavitavyaṃ mahātmanā /
     bhavāndhakūpe patatāṃ vicāro hy avalambanam // Mo_2,14.48 //
"hi" yasmādarthe | "avalambanam" ādhāraḥ || MoT_2,14.48 ||


     svayam evātmanātmānam avaṣṭabhya vicārataḥ /
     saṃsāramohajaladhes tārayet svamanomṛgam // Mo_2,14.49 //
"ātmanā" manasā | "ātmānaṃ" paramātmānam | "avaṣṭabhya" bhāvanayā gṛhītvā || MoT_2,14.49 ||


vicārasya svarūpaṃ kathayati
     ko 'haṃ katham ayaṃ doṣaḥ saṃsārākhya upāgataḥ /
     nyāyeneti parāmarśo vicāra iti kathyate // Mo_2,14.50 //
"nyāyena" yuktyā | "parāmarśaḥ" santatabhāvanam || MoT_2,14.50 ||


     andhāndhamohamukharaṃ ciraṃ duḥkhāya kevalam /
     kṛtaṃ śilāyā hṛdayaṃ durmateś cāvicāriṇaḥ // Mo_2,14.51 //
atiṣayenāndham "andhāndham" | tādṛśaṃ ca tat "mohamukharaṃ" ca | jāḍyena viparyāsayuktam ity arthaḥ | "duḥkhāya" svasya parasya ceti jñeyam || MoT_2,14.51 ||



     bhāvābhāvagrahotsargadṛśām iha hi rāghava /
     na vicārād ṛte tattvaṃ jñāyate sādhu kiṃcana // Mo_2,14.52 //
"grahaḥ" grahaṇaṃ | "utsargaḥ" tyāgaḥ || MoT_2,14.52 ||



     vicārāj jñāyate tattvaṃ tattvād viśrāntir ātmani /
     tato manasi śāntatvaṃ sarvaduḥkhaparikṣayaḥ // Mo_2,14.53 //
"tattvam" cinmātrākhyaṃ paramaṃ tattvam | "ātmani" śuddhacinmātrarūpe ātmani | "śāntatvasya" svarūpaṃ kathayati | "sarve"ti | "sarvaduḥkhakṣayasyai"va śāntirūpatvāt || MoT_2,14.53 ||

sargāntaślokena vicāranirūpaṇaṃ samāpayati
          saphalatā phalate bhuvi karmaṇāṃ
          prakaṭatāṃ kila gacchata uttamāt /
          sphuṭavicāradṛśaiva vicāritā
          śamavate bhavate 'pi virocatām // Mo_2,14.54 //
"kila" niścaye | "bhuvi karmaṇāṃ saphalatā phalate" | "sphuṭavicāradṛśaiva" "sphuṭā" yā "vicāradṛk" | tayaiva | "uttamāt" viśeṣataḥ | "prakaṭatāṃ" "gacchataḥ" vivekasyaiva sarvaprakaṭane śaktatvāt | ataḥ iyaṃ "vicāritā" "śamavate bhavate 'pi virocatām" | iti śivam || MoT_2,14.54 ||




iti śrībhāskarakaṇṭhaviracitāyāṃ śrīmokṣopāyaṭīkāyāṃ mumukṣuprakaraṇe caturdaśaḥ sargaḥ || 2,14 ||


************************************************************************

oṃ evaṃ vicārasvarūpaṃ nirṇīya tṛtīyasya saṃtoṣasya svarūpaṃ kathayati
     saṃtoṣo 'pi paraṃ śreyaḥ saṃtoṣaḥ sukham ucyate /
     saṃtuṣṭaḥ param abhyeti viśrāmam arisūdana // Mo_2,15.1 //
"saṃtuṣṭaḥ" saṃtoṣayuktaḥ puruṣaḥ || MoT_2,15.1 ||


     saṃtoṣaiśvaryasukhināṃ ciraviśrāntacetasām /
     sāmrājyam api sādhūnāṃ jarattṛṇalavāyate // Mo_2,15.2 //
spaṣṭam || MoT_2,15.2 ||


     saṃtoṣaśālinī buddhī rāma saṃsāravṛttiṣu /
     viṣamāsv apy anudvignā na kadācana dūyate // Mo_2,15.3 //
"na dūyate" saṃtapyate saṃtuṣṭavān || MoT_2,15.3 ||


     saṃtoṣāmṛtapānena ye parāṃ tṛptim āgatāḥ /
     bhogaśrīr atulā teṣām eṣā prativiṣāyate // Mo_2,15.4 //
prativiṣā ivācarate "prativiṣāyate" | prativiṣā tiktadravyaviśeṣaḥ || MoT_2,15.4 ||


     na tathā tarpayanty etāḥ pīyūṣarasavīcayaḥ /
     yathā hi madhurāsvādaḥ saṃtoṣo doṣanāśanaḥ // Mo_2,15.5 //
spaṣṭam || MoT_2,15.5 ||


saṃtuṣṭasvarūpakathanadvāreṇa saṃtoṣasvarūpaṃ kathayati
     aprāptavāñchām utsṛjya saṃprāpte samatāṃ gataḥ /
     adṛṣṭakhedākhedo 'ntaḥ sa saṃtuṣṭa ihocyate // Mo_2,15.6 //
"saṃprāpte" pravāhāgate || MoT_2,15.6 ||


     ātmanātmani saṃtoṣaṃ yāvad yāti na mānasam /
     udbhavanty āpadas tāval latā iva manovanāt // Mo_2,15.7 //
"ātmanā" svena | na tu bhogādinā || MoT_2,15.7 ||


     saṃtoṣaśītalaṃ cetaḥ śuddhavijñānadṛṣṭibhiḥ /
     bhṛśaṃ vikāsam āyāti sūryāṃśubhir ivāmbujam // Mo_2,15.8 //
saṃtuṣṭasyaiva jñāne adhikāra iti bhāvaḥ || MoT_2,15.8 ||


     āśāvaivaśyavivaśe citte saṃtoṣavarjite /
     mlāne vaktram ivādarśe na jñānaṃ pratibimbati // Mo_2,15.9 //
"pratibimbati" lagati || MoT_2,15.9 ||



     ajñānaghanayāminyā saṃkocaṃ na narāmbujam /
     yāty asāv udito yasya nityaṃ saṃtoṣabhāskaraḥ // Mo_2,15.10 //
tat "narāmbujam ajñānaghanayāminyā saṃkocaṃ na yāti" | tat kim | "yasyāsau saṃtoṣabhāskaraḥ nityam udito" bhavati || MoT_2,15.10 ||


     akiṃcano 'py asau jantuḥ sāmrājyasukham aśnute /
     ādhivyādhivinirmuktaṃ saṃtuṣṭaṃ yasya mānasam // Mo_2,15.11 //
spaṣṭam || MoT_2,15.11 ||


     nābhivāñchaty asaṃprāptaṃ prāptaṃ bhuṅkte yathākramam /
     yaḥ sasomyaḥ sadācāraḥ saṃtuṣṭa iti kathyate // Mo_2,15.12 //
spaṣṭam || MoT_2,15.12 ||


     saṃtoṣaparitṛptasya mahataḥ pūrṇacetasaḥ /
     kṣīrābdher iva śuddhasya mukhe lakṣmīr virājate // Mo_2,15.13 //
spaṣṭam || MoT_2,15.13 ||


     pūrṇatām alam āśritya svātmany evātmanā svayam /
     pauruṣeṇa prayatnena tṛṣṇāṃ sarvatra varjayet // Mo_2,15.14 //
"pūrṇatāṃ" tṛptatām | "ātmanā eva" | na tu bhogair ity arthaḥ || MoT_2,15.14 ||


     saṃtoṣāmṛtapūrṇasya svāntaḥ śītalatā svayam /
     sthairyam āyāty ariktasya śītāṃśor iva śāśvatam // Mo_2,15.15 //
"svāntaḥ" svamanasi | "ariktasya" pūrṇasya || MoT_2,15.15 ||


     saṃtoṣapuṣṭamanasaṃ bhṛtyā iva maharddhayaḥ /
     rājānam upatiṣṭhante kiṃkaratvam upāgatāḥ // Mo_2,15.16 //
yathā "kiṃkaratvam upāgatāḥ bhṛtyāḥ rājānam upatiṣṭhante" tathā "saṃtoṣapuṣṭamanasaṃ" "maharddhayaḥ upatiṣṭhante" || MoT_2,15.16 ||



     ātmanaivātmani svacche saṃtuṣṭe puruṣe sthite /
     praśāmyanty ādhayaḥ sarve prāvṛṣīvāśu pāṃsavaḥ // Mo_2,15.17 //
"svacche" rāgādimalarahite || MoT_2,15.17 ||


     nityaṃ śītalayā nāma kalaṅkaparihīnayā /
     puruṣaḥ śuddhayā vṛttyā bhāti pūrṇatayenduvat // Mo_2,15.18 //
"nāma" niścaye | "kalaṅkahīnayā" asantoṣākhyamalarahitayā || MoT_2,15.18 ||


saṃtoṣavivecanaṃ sargāntaślokena samāpayati
          samatayā matayā guṇaśālināṃ
          puruṣarāḍ iha yaḥ samalaṃkṛtaḥ /
          tam amalaṃ praṇamanti nabhaścarā
          api mahāmunayo raghunandana // Mo_2,15.19 //
spaṣṭam | iti śivam || MoT_2,15.19 ||


iti śrībhāskarakaṇṭhaviracitāyāṃ śrīmokṣopāyaṭīkāyāṃ mumukṣuprakaraṇe pañcadaśaḥ sargaḥ || 2,15 ||


************************************************************************

oṃ evaṃ saṃtoṣasvarūpaṃ nirṇīya caturthaṃ satsaṃgaṃ nirūpayati
     viśeṣeṇa mahābuddhe saṃsārottaraṇe nṛṇām /
     sarvatropakarotīha sādhuḥ sādhusamāgamaḥ // Mo_2,16.1 //
spaṣṭam || MoT_2,16.1 ||


     sādhusaṃgataror jātaṃ vivekakusumaṃ śubham /
     rakṣanti ye mahātmāno bhājanaṃ te phalaśriyaḥ // Mo_2,16.2 //
"phalaśriyaḥ" mokṣākhyaphalalakṣmyāḥ || MoT_2,16.2 ||


     śūnyam ākīrṇatām eti mṛtir apy utsavāyate /
     āpat saṃpad ivābhāti vidvajjanasamāgame // Mo_2,16.3 //
"śūnyaṃ" śūnyadeśaḥ | "ākīrṇatām" lokabharitadeśatām || MoT_2,16.3 ||



     himam āpatsarojinyā mohanīhāramārutaḥ /
     jayaty eko jagaty asmin sādhu sādhusamāgamaḥ // Mo_2,16.4 //
"sādhu" samyak || MoT_2,16.4 ||



     paraṃ vivardhanaṃ buddher ajñānatarunāśanam /
     samutsāraṇam ādhīnāṃ viddhi sādhusamāgamam // Mo_2,16.5 //
"samutsāraṇam" nāśanam || MoT_2,16.5 ||


     vivekaḥ paramo dīpo jāyate sādhusaṃgamāt /
     manoharojjvalo nūnam aśokād iva gucchakam // Mo_2,16.6 //
spaṣṭam || MoT_2,16.6 ||


     nirāmayāṃ nirābādhāṃ nirvṛtiṃ nityapīvarīṃ /
     anuttamāṃ prayacchanti sādhusaṃgavibhūtayaḥ // Mo_2,16.7 //
spaṣṭam || MoT_2,16.7 ||



     api kaṣṭatarāṃ prāptair daśāṃ vivaśatāṃ gataiḥ /
     manāg api na saṃtyājyā mānavaiḥ sādhusaṃgatiḥ // Mo_2,16.8 //
spaṣṭam || MoT_2,16.8 ||


     sādhusaṃgatayo loke sanmārgaśubhadīpakāḥ /
     hārdāndhakārahāriṇyo bhāso jñānavivasvataḥ // Mo_2,16.9 //
spaṣṭam || MoT_2,16.9 ||


     yaḥ snātaḥ śītasitayā sādhusaṃgatigaṅgayā /
     kiṃ tasya dānaiḥ kiṃ tīrthaiḥ kiṃ tapobhiḥ kim adhvaraiḥ // Mo_2,16.10 //
spaṣṭam || MoT_2,16.10 ||



     nīrāgāś chinnasaṃdehā galitagranthayo 'nagha /
     sādhavo yadi vidyante kiṃ tapastīrthasaṃgrahaiḥ // Mo_2,16.11 //
"galitagranthayaḥ" naṣṭakāmākhyagranthayaḥ || MoT_2,16.11 ||



     viśrāntamanaso vandyāḥ prayatnena pareṇa hi /
     daridreṇeva maṇayaḥ prekṣaṇīyā hi sādhavaḥ // Mo_2,16.12 //
spaṣṭam || MoT_2,16.12 ||


     satsamāgamasaundaryaśālinī dhīmatāṃ matiḥ /
     kamalevāpsarovṛnde sarvadaiva virājate // Mo_2,16.13 //
"kamalā" lakṣmīḥ || MoT_2,16.13 ||


     tenāmalavilāsasya padasyāgrāvacūlatā /
     grathitā yena bhavyena na tyaktā sādhusaṃgatiḥ // Mo_2,16.14 //
"tena" puruṣeṇa | "amalavilāsasya" śuddhasphuraṇayuktasya | "padasya" cinmātrākhyasya sthānasya | "agrāvacūlatā" śirobhūṣaṇatā | "grathitā yena bhavyena" daivaprakṛtikena | "sādhusaṃgatiḥ na tyaktā" sādhusaṃgatiḥ kāryaiva cinmātrākhye pade rājate iti bhāvaḥ || MoT_2,16.14 ||



     vicchinnagranthayas tajjñāḥ sādhavaḥ sarvasammatāḥ /
     sarvopāyena saṃsevyās te hy upāyā bhavāmbudhau // Mo_2,16.15 //
spaṣṭam || MoT_2,16.15 ||



     ta ete narakāgnīnāṃ saṃśuṣkendhanatāṃ gatāḥ /
     yair dṛṣṭā helayā santo narakānalavāridāḥ // Mo_2,16.16 //
spaṣṭam || MoT_2,16.16 ||


     dāridryaṃ maraṇaṃ duḥkham ityādiviṣamo bhramaḥ /
     saṃpraśāmyaty aśeṣeṇa sādhusaṃgamabheṣajaiḥ // Mo_2,16.17 //
spaṣṭam || MoT_2,16.17 ||


sarvān upāyān saṃkalpayati
     saṃtoṣaḥ sādhusaṃgaś ca vicāro 'tha śamas tathā /
     eta eva bhavāmbhodhāv upāyās taraṇe nṛṇām // Mo_2,16.18 //
spaṣṭam || MoT_2,16.18 ||


     saṃtoṣaḥ paramo lābhaḥ satsaṃgaḥ paramā gatiḥ /
     vicāraḥ paramaṃ jñānaṃ śamo hi paramaṃ sukhaṃ // Mo_2,16.19 //
ataḥ paraṃ lābhādi nāstīti "para"padābhiprāyaḥ || MoT_2,16.19 ||

     catvāra ete vimalā upāyā bhavabhedane /
     yair abhyastās ta uttīrṇā mohavārer bhavārṇavāt // Mo_2,16.20 //
"mohavāreḥ" mohākhyajalayuktāt || MoT_2,16.20 ||


     ekasminn eva caiteṣām abhyaste vimalodaye /
     catvāro 'pi kilābhyastā bhavanti sudhiyāṃ vara // Mo_2,16.21 //
spaṣṭam || MoT_2,16.21 ||


     eko 'py eko 'pi sarveṣāṃ eṣāṃ prasavabhūr iva /
     sarvasaṃsiddhaye tasmād yatnenaikaṃ samāśrayet // Mo_2,16.22 //
"prasavabhūḥ" utpattisthānam || MoT_2,16.22 ||


     satsamāgamasaṃtoṣavicārās tv avicāritam /
     pravartante śamasvacche vahanānīva sāgare // Mo_2,16.23 //
"vahanāni" jalaspandāḥ | "avicāritam" asandeham || MoT_2,16.23 ||


     vicārasaṃtoṣaśamāḥ satsamāgamaśālini /
     pravartante śriyo jantau kalpavṛkṣāśrite yathā // Mo_2,16.24 //
spaṣṭam || MoT_2,16.24 ||


     vicāraśamasatsaṃgāḥ saṃtoṣavati mānave /
     pravartante prapūrṇendau saundaryādyā guṇā iva // Mo_2,16.25 //
spaṣṭam || MoT_2,16.25 ||



     satsaṃgasaṃtoṣaśamā vicāravati sanmatau /
     pravartante mantrivare rājanīva jayaśriyaḥ // Mo_2,16.26 //
"mantriṇāṃ" mantrajñānāṃ | "vare" śreṣṭhe || MoT_2,16.26 ||


phalitam āha
     tasmād ekatamaṃ nityam eteṣāṃ raghunandana /
     pauruṣeṇa mano jitvā yatnenābhyāhared guṇam // Mo_2,16.27 //
"tasmāt eteṣāṃ" caturṇāṃ madhye | "ekatamaṃ guṇaṃ" saṃtoṣādirūpaṃ guṇaṃ | "abhyāharet" arjayet || MoT_2,16.27 ||



     paraṃ pauruṣam āśritya jitvā cittamataṅgajam /
     yāvad eko guṇo nāptas tāvan nāsty uttamā gatiḥ // Mo_2,16.28 //
spaṣṭam || MoT_2,16.28 ||


     pauruṣeṇa prayatnena dantair dantān vicūrṇayan /
     yāvan nābhiniviṣṭaṃ te mano rāma guṇārjane // Mo_2,16.29 //
     devo bhavātha yakṣo vā puruṣaḥ pādapo 'tha vā /
     tāvat tava mahābāho nopāyo 'stīha kaścana // Mo_2,16.30 //
"guṇārjane" saṃtoṣādyarjane || MoT_2,16.29-30 ||


     ekasminn eva phalite guṇe balam upāgate /
     kṣīyante sarva evāśu doṣā viṣadacetasaḥ // Mo_2,16.31 //
"doṣāḥ" rāgādayaḥ || MoT_2,16.31 ||



     guṇe vivṛddhe vardhante guṇā doṣakṣayāvahāḥ /
     doṣe vivṛddhe vardhante doṣā guṇavināśinaḥ // Mo_2,16.32 //
spaṣṭam || MoT_2,16.32 ||


     manomahāvane hy asmin veginī vāsanāsarit /
     śubhāśubhabṛhatkūlā nityaṃ vahati jantuṣu // Mo_2,16.33 //
spaṣṭam || MoT_2,16.33 ||


     sā hi svena prayatnena yasminn eva nipātyate /
     kūle tenaiva vahati yathecchasi tathā kuru // Mo_2,16.34 //
"hi" niścaye | "sā" vāsanāsarit || MoT_2,16.34 ||


sargāntaślokenaitat samāpayati
          puruṣayatnajavena manovane
          śubhataṭānugatāṃ kramaśaḥ kuru /
          varamate nijabhāvamahānadīm
          iha hi tena manāg api nohyase // Mo_2,16.35 //
"puruṣayatnajavena" pauruṣavegena | "nijabhāvanadīṃ" svavāsanā"mahānadīṃ" | nanu kimarthaṃ tāṃ taṭagatāṃ karomīty apekṣāyām āha | "iha hī"ti | "hi" yasmāt | "tena" tasyāḥ "śubhataṭānugamanena" | tayā nijabhāvamahānadyā tvam "na uhyase" vivaśatayā yatra tatra na nīyase | taṭagatayā ca nadyā na kiṃcit uhyate | iti śivam || MoT_2,16.35 ||




iti śrībhāskarakaṇṭhaviracitāyāṃ śrīmokṣopāyaṭīkāyāṃ mumukṣuprakaraṇe ṣoḍaśaḥ sargaḥ || 2,16 ||


************************************************************************

phalitaṃ kathayati
     evam āttaviveko yaḥ sa bhavān iva rāghava /
     yogyo jñānagiraḥ śrotuṃ rājeva nayabhāratīḥ // Mo_2,17.1 //
he "rāghava" | "evaṃ" sati | "yaḥ" puruṣaḥ | "āttaviveko" bhavati | "saḥ" | "bhavān iva" | "jñānagiraḥ śrotuṃ yogyo" bhavati| ka iva | "rājā iva" yathā "rājā nayabhāratīḥ" nītivākyāni "śrotuṃ yogyaḥ" bhavati | tathety arthaḥ || MoT_2,17.1 ||



     avadāto 'vadātasya vijñānasya mahāśayaḥ /
     jaḍasaṅgojjhito yogyaḥ śaradīndor yathā nabhaḥ // Mo_2,17.2 //
"avadātaḥ" śamādisevanena rāgādimalarahitaḥ nirmalaś ca | "avadātasya" śuddhacinmātraviṣayatvena śuddhasya sitasya ca | "jaḍasaṅgena" mūḍhasaṅgen"ojjhitaḥ" tyaktaḥ | tam akurvāṇa ity arthaḥ | jaḍānāṃ lakṣaṇayā meghānāṃ "saṅgena ujjhitaḥ" iti ca || MoT_2,17.2 ||


     tvam etayākhaṇḍitayā guṇalakṣmyā samāśritaḥ /
     manomohaharaṃ vākyaṃ vakṣyamāṇam idaṃ śṛṇu // Mo_2,17.3 //
spaṣṭam || MoT_2,17.3 ||


     puṇyakalpadrumo yasya phalabhārānataḥ sthitaḥ /
     muktaye jāyate jantos tasyedaṃ śrotum udyamaḥ // Mo_2,17.4 //
"idam" etat śāstram || MoT_2,17.4 ||


     pāvanānām udārāṇāṃ parabodhaikadāyinām /
     vacasāṃ bhājanaṃ bhūtyai bhavyo bhavati nādhamaḥ // Mo_2,17.5 //
"bhavyaḥ" divyaprakṛtiḥ || MoT_2,17.5 ||



     mokṣopāyābhidhāneyaṃ saṃhitā sārasammitā /
     triṃśad dve ca sahasrāṇi jñātā nirvāṇadāyinī // Mo_2,17.6 //
"saṃhitā" śāstram | "sārasammitā" sāratulyā | "jñātā" samyak vicāritā || MoT_2,17.6 ||


nanu kim anayā setsyatīty | atrāha
     dīpe yathā vinidrasya jvalite saṃpravartate /
     āloko 'nicchato 'py evaṃ nirvāṇam anayā bhavet // Mo_2,17.7 //
"yathā dīpe" pra"jvalite" | "anicchataḥ api" ālokānākāṅkṣiṇo 'pi | ardha"nidrasyā"rdhaprabuddhasya | "ālokaḥ saṃpravartate" | "evam anayā" saṃhitayā | "nirvāṇam" brahmaṇy ātyantiko layo | "bhavet" || MoT_2,17.7 ||



     svayaṃ jñātā śrutā vāpi bhrāntiśāntyaiva saukhyadā /
     āptoktivarṇitā sadyo yathāmṛtataraṅgiṇī // Mo_2,17.8 //
"āptoktivarṇite"ti "śrute"ty asya viśeṣaṇadvāreṇa hetuḥ |8|| MoT_2,17.
     yathā rajjvām ahibhrāntir vinaśyaty avalokanāt /
     tathaitatprekṣaṇāc chāntim eti saṃsāraduḥkhitā // Mo_2,17.9 //
"etasyāḥ" saṃhitāyāḥ "prekṣaṇam" vicāraṇam "etatprekṣaṇam" | tasmāt ||9|| MoT_2,17.
     yuktiyuktārthavākyāni kalpitāni pṛthak pṛthak /
     dṛṣṭāntasārasūktāni cāsyāṃ prakaraṇāni ṣaṭ // Mo_2,17.10 //
mayā "ṣaṭ prakaraṇāni asyāṃ kalpitāni" vihitāni| kathaṃbhūtāni | arthasahitāni vākyāni "arthavākyāni" | "yuktiyuktāni" arthavākyāni yeṣu | tāni| punaḥ kathaṃbhūtāni | "dṛṣṭāntaiḥ sāram" śreṣṭham "sūktaṃ" yeṣu | tāni ||10|| MoT_2,17.
prakaraṇaṣaṭkam viśeṣato nirdiśati
     vairāgyākhyaṃ prakaraṇaṃ prathamaṃ parikīrtitam /
     vairāgyaṃ vardhate yena sekeneva marau taruḥ // Mo_2,17.11 //
nanu kiṃ tena saṃpadyata ity | atrāha | "vairāgyam" iti ||11|| MoT_2,17.
kiyatpramāṇaṃ tat kṛtam ity apekṣāyām āha
     sārdhaṃ sahasraṃ granthasya yasmin hṛdi vicārite | /
     prakāśā śuddhatodeti maṇāv iva vimārjite // Mo_2,17.12 //
"granthasye"ti jātāv ekavacanam| tat vairāgyaprakaraṇaṃ "granthasya" ślokānāṃ "sārdhaṃ sahasraṃ" bhavati| tat kiṃ | "yasmin hṛdi vicārite" sati | "prakāśā" prakaṭā | "śuddhatā" rāgādimalarāhityaṃ "udeti" | kasminn iva | "mārjite" śodhite "maṇau iva" | yathā "vimārjite maṇau śuddhatodeti" | tathety arthaḥ ||12|| MoT_2,17.
     mumukṣuvyavahārākhyaṃ tataḥ prakaraṇaṃ kṛtam /
     sahasramātraṃ granthasya sūktigranthena sundaram // Mo_2,17.13 //
"sūkti"rūpaḥ yaḥ "granthaḥ" vākyam | tena "sundaram" | tadyuktam ity arthaḥ ||13|| MoT_2,17.
nanu kiṃ tatra kathyate ity | atrāha
     svabhāvo hi mumukṣūṇāṃ narāṇāṃ yatra varṇyate /
     evaṃsvabhāvo mokṣasya yogya ity avagamyate // Mo_2,17.14 //
nanu varṇanena kiṃ setsyatīty | atrāha | "evaṃsvabhāva" iti ||14|| MoT_2,17.
     athotpattiprakaraṇaṃ dṛṣṭāntākhyāyikāmayam /
     pañcagranthasahasrāṇi vijñānapratipādanam // Mo_2,17.15 //
"vijñānapratipādanam" vijñānapratipādakam ity arthaḥ ||15|| MoT_2,17.
     jāgatī draṣṭṛdṛśyaśrīr ahaṃ tvam itirūpiṇī /
     anutthitaivotthiteva yatreti parivarṇyate // Mo_2,17.16 //
spaṣṭam ||16|| MoT_2,17.
     yasmiñ śrute jagad idaṃ śrotrāntar budhyate 'khilam /
     sāsmadyuṣmat savistāraṃ salokākāśaparvatam // Mo_2,17.17 //
     piṇḍagrahavinirmuktaṃ nirbhittikam aparvatam /
     pṛthvyādibhūtarahitaṃ saṃkalpa iva pattanam // Mo_2,17.18 //
"yasmin" yasmin utpattiprakaraṇe | "sāsmadyuṣmat" ahaṃtvaṃyuktam | "budhyate" ity | atra "śrotre"ti kartṛtvenādhyāhāryam| kīdṛśaṃ budhyate ity apekṣāyām āha | "piṇḍagrahe"tyādi | "saṃkalpe" hi "pattanam" īdṛg eva bhātīti dṛṣṭāntatvenopāttam  ||17-18|| MoT_2,17.
punaḥ kīdṛg budhyate ity | atrāha
     svapnopalabdhabhāvābhaṃ manorājyavad ātatam /
     gandharvanagaraprakhyam arthaśūnyopalambanam // Mo_2,17.19 //
"svapnopalabdhabhāvābhaṃ" svapnadṛṣṭapadārthasadṛśam ity arthaḥ | gandharvāḥ svāvāsārthaṃ kalpanayākāśe nagaraṃ kalpayanti | tad eva "gandharvanagaram" | "arthaśūnyaṃ" satyabhūtaghaṭādyartharahitaṃ | "upalambanaṃ" jñānaṃ yasmin  ||19|| MoT_2,17.
     dvicandravibhramābhāsaṃ mṛgatṛṣṇāmbuvat tatam /
     nauyānalolaśailābhaṃ satyalābhavivarjitam // Mo_2,17.20 //
spaṣṭam ||20|| MoT_2,17.
     cittabhramapiśācābhaṃ nirbījam api bhāsuram /
     kathārthapratibhānābhaṃ vyomamuktāvalīnibham // Mo_2,17.21 //
"nirbījaṃ" kāraṇarahitaṃ | "kathāyāḥ" yaḥ "arthaḥ" varṇanīyaḥ padārthaḥ | tasya yat "pratibhānaṃ" pura iva sphuraṇaṃ | ten"ābhā" yasya | tat | kathāyāṃ hi varṇanīyaḥ padārthaḥ puraḥstha iva pratibhāti | "vyome"ti | bhrameṇa hi vyomni "muktāvalī" dṛśyate ||21|| MoT_2,17.
     kaṭakatvaṃ yathā hemni taraṅgatvaṃ yathāmbhasi /
     yathā nabhasi nīlatvam asad evotthitaṃ tathā // Mo_2,17.22 //
"kaṭakā"di "yathā hemni asad evotthitaṃ" bhavati "tathāsad evotthitaṃ" jagad budhyate iti pūrveṇaiva sambandhaḥ ||22|| MoT_2,17.
     abhitti raṅgarahitam upalabdhimanoharam /
     svapne vā vyomni vā citram akarma cirabhāsuram // Mo_2,17.23 //
"vā"śabdadvayaṃ pakṣāntaradyotakaṃ | "svapne" dṛṣṭaṃ "citram" "vā" budhyate | "vyomni" bhrameṇa dṛṣṭaṃ "citram" "vā" budhyate | citraṃ kathaṃbhūtaṃ | "abhitti" bhittirahitaṃ | tathā "raṅgarahitam" raṅgadravyarahitam | punaḥ kathaṃbhūtaṃ | "akarma" anirmiti | tathā ciraṃ bhāsvaram "cirabhāsuram" | etaiḥ viśeṣaṇaiś ca citrasya lokottaratvam uktam ||23|| MoT_2,17.
     avahnir eva vahnitvaṃ dhatte citrānalo yathā /
     tathā dadhaj jagacchabdarūpārtham asadātmakam // Mo_2,17.24 //
"tathā" tadvat | "asadātmakam" asatsvarūpam | "jagacchabdarūpārtham" bhāvapradhāno nirdeśaḥ | jagad iti yacchabdarūpaṃ tasyārthatvaṃ "dadhat" budhyate "tathā" | kathaṃ | "yathā citrānalaḥ avahniḥ" adāhakatā anagniḥ san | "asadātmakaṃ vahnitvaṃ dhatte" dhārayati ||24|| MoT_2,17.
     taraṅgotpalamālāḍhyadṛṣatpattram ivotthitam /
     cakraśūtkāracūrṇasya malarāśim ivoditam // Mo_2,17.25 //
"taraṅgotpalamālābhiḥ āḍhyaṃ" yat "dṛṣatpattram" śilāpattram | tad "ivotthitaṃ" budhyate | śilāpattre hi taraṅgākāraḥ utpalākārāś ca rekhāḥ bhavanti | tā evātra "taraṅgotpalamālāḥ" jñeyāḥ | padārthāś cātra "taraṅgotpalamālāsthānīyāh" | punaḥ kīdṛg budhyate ity | atrāha | "cakre"ti | "cakrasya" bhrāmyamāṇasya cakrasya | yat "śūtkāracūrṇam" | tasya "malarāśim iva uditaṃ" budhyate | bhrāmyamāṇena cakreṇa hi saśūtkāraṃ bhūmeḥ rajaḥ uttiṣṭhati ||25|| MoT_2,17.
     śīrṇaparṇaṃ bhraṣṭanaṣṭaṃ grīṣme vanam ivārasam /
     maraṇavyagranṛttābhaṃ śilāstrīhāsyahāsadam // Mo_2,17.26 //
"śilāstrīhāsya"vat "hāsadam" ||26|| MoT_2,17.
     andhakāragṛhaikaikanṛttam unmattaceṣṭitam /
     praśāntājñānanīhāraṃ vijñānaśaradambaram // Mo_2,17.27 //
"andhakāragṛhe" yat "ekaikasya nṛttam" tadrūpaṃ budhyate | sarvathā cāsatyataram eva budhyate iti iha tāvad abhiprāyaḥ | itaḥ paraṃ cinmātramayaṃ cinmātrasthaṃ ca budhyata ity abhiprāyeṇāha | "praśānte"ti | śrotrā asminn utpattiprakaraṇe śrute sati idaṃ "praśāntājñānanīhāraṃ jñānaśaradambaraṃ" budhyate ||27|| MoT_2,17.
     samutkīrṇam iva stambhe citraṃ bhittāv ivāhitam /
     paṅkād ivābhiracitaṃ sacetanam acetanam // Mo_2,17.28 //
"stambhe" cinmātrākhye stambhe | "samutkīrṇam iva" budhyate | tathā "bhittau" cinmātrākhyāyāṃ bhittau | "citram ivāhitaṃ" kṛtaṃ budhyate | "paṅko" 'tra cinmātrasvarūpaṃ jñeyaṃ | "sacetanaṃ" cinmātrasāratvāt | "acetanaṃ" grāhyatvāt ||28|| MoT_2,17.
     tataḥ sthitiprakaraṇaṃ caturthaṃ parikalpitam /
     trīṇi granthasahasrāṇi svākhyānākhyāyikāmayam // Mo_2,17.29 //
śobhanākhyāḥ "ākhyānākhyāyikāḥ" | tan"mayam" ||29|| MoT_2,17.
nanu sthitiprakaraṇe kim uktam ity | atrāha
     itthaṃ jagad ahaṃbhāvarūpaṃ sthitim upāgatam /
     draṣṭṛdṛśyakramaprauḍham ity atra parivarṇitam // Mo_2,17.30 //
"ahaṃbhāvarūpasya" "jagataḥ" "sthitir" evātra prāyaśo nirṇīyate iti bhāvaḥ ||30|| MoT_2,17.
     daśadiṅmaṇḍalābhogabhāsuro 'yaṃ jagadbhramaḥ /
     ittham abhyāgato vṛddhim iti tatrocyate ciram // Mo_2,17.31 //
"ciram" bahukālam | bāhulyeneti yāvat ||31|| MoT_2,17.
     upaśāntiprakaraṇaṃ tataḥ pañcasahasrikam /
     pañcamaṃ pāvanaṃ proktaṃ munisantatisundaram // Mo_2,17.32 //
"munisantatibhiḥ" dṛṣṭāntatayā vakṣyamāṇābhiḥ munisantatibhiḥ | "sundaram" ramaṇīyam ||32|| MoT_2,17.
nanv atra kiṃ varṇyata ity apekṣāyām āha
     idaṃ jagad ahaṃ tvaṃ ca sa iti bhrāntir utthitā /
     ity asau śāmyatīty asmin kathyate ślokasaṅgrahe // Mo_2,17.33 //
"idaṃ jagat ahaṃ tvaṃ ca saḥ" | "iti" evaṃrūpā | "bhrāntiḥ utthitā" | iti satī eva | "śāmyati" | "iti" evam | "asmin" upaśāntiprakaraṇe "kathyate" | "asmin" kathaṃbhūte | "ślokānāṃ saṅgrahaḥ" yasmin saḥ | tādṛśe | "sa" iti paramakāraṇaparāmarśaḥ  ||33|| MoT_2,17.
nanv etacchravaṇena kiṃ setsyatīty | atrāha
     upaśāntiprakaraṇe śrute śāmyati saṃsṛtiḥ /
     praspaṣṭā vibhrameṇaiva kiṃcillabhyopalambhanā // Mo_2,17.34 //
"saṃsṛtiḥ" kathaṃbhūtā | "vibhrameṇaiva" viparyayajñānenaiva "praspaṣṭā" | punaḥ kathaṃbhūtā | "kiṃcit" leśena | "labhyam upalambhanaṃ" sparśaḥ yasyāḥ sā | anyathā nirvāṇaprakaraṇaṃ vyarthaṃ syāt iti bhāvaḥ ||34|| MoT_2,17.
nanu tataḥ saṃsṛtiḥ kīdṛśī tiṣṭhatīty apekṣāyām āha
     śatāṃśaśiṣṭā bhavati saṃśāntabhrāntirūpiṇī /
     anyasaṃkalpacittasthā nagaraśrīr ivāsatī // Mo_2,17.35 //
spaṣṭam ||35|| MoT_2,17.
     alabhyaiva svapārśvasthasvapnayuddhavirāvavat /
     śāntasaṃkalpamattābhrabhīṣaṇāśaniśabdavat // Mo_2,17.36 //
saṃkalpe dṛṣṭaṃ mattābhram "saṃkalpamattābhram" | "śāntaṃ" yat "saṃkalpamattābhram" | tasya yaḥ "bhīṣaṇaḥ aśaniśabdaḥ" | tad"vat" ||36|| MoT_2,17.
     vismṛtasvapnasaṃkalpanirmāṇanagaropamā /
     bhaviṣyannagarodyānasotsavaśyāmalāṅgikā // Mo_2,17.37 //
"vismṛtau" yau "svapnasaṃkalpau" | tayoḥ "nirmāṇaṃ" yasya | tādṛśaṃ yat "nagaraṃ" | ten"opamā" yasyāḥ sā | tathā "bhaviṣyannagarodyāne sotsavā" samadanā | yā "śyāmalā" śyāmākhyā strī | tadvat "aṅgaṃ" svarūpaṃ yasyāṃ sā | tādṛśī ||37|| MoT_2,17.
     naśyajjihvocyamānograkathārthānubhavopamam /
     anullikhitacittasthacitravyāpteva bhittibhūḥ // Mo_2,17.38 //
punaḥ kathaṃbhūtā | "naśyajjihvena" | na tu naṣṭajihvena | "ucyamānā" yā "ugrakathā" | tasyāḥ yaḥ "arthaḥ" | tasya yaḥ "anubhavaḥ" | ten"opamā" yatra tat | tādrśam | kā iva | "anullikhitāni" "cittasthāni" ca tāni citrakṛc"cittasthāni" ca yāni "citrāṇi" | taiḥ "vyāptā bhittibhūr iva" ||38|| MoT_2,17.
     parivismāryamāṇācchakalpanānagarīnibhā /
     sarvartumadanutpannavaramardāsphuṭākṛtiḥ // Mo_2,17.39 //
"parivismāryamāṇā" | na tu vismāritā | yā "acchā" bhittirahitā | "kalpanānagarī" | tasyāḥ "nibhā" sadṛśī | "sarvāsām ṛtumatīnām anutpannasya" "varasya mardaḥ" mardanam | tadvat "asphuṭā ākṛtiḥ" yasyāḥ sā | nikaṭavartitvena buddhāv ārūḍhatvajñāpanārtham ṛtumatīnām ity uktam ||39|| MoT_2,17.
     bhāvipuṣpavarākāravasantarasarañjanā /
     antarlīnataraṅgaughasaumyavārisaritsamā // Mo_2,17.40 //
"bhāvī puṣpā"khyo "varākāraḥ" yasya saḥ | tādṛśo yaḥ "vasantarasaḥ" | tadvat "rañjanā" yasyāḥ sā | tatsadṛśīty arthaḥ | "antarlīnaḥ taraṅgaughaḥ" yasyāḥ sā "antarlīnataraṅgaughā" | tādṛśī cāsau "saumyavārisarit" saumyavāriyuktā nadī | tayā "samā" sadṛśī | etair viśeṣaṇaiś copaśāntiprakaraṇaśravaṇānantaraṃ buddhyārohamātrasvarūpā sṛṣṭis tiṣṭhatīti sūcitam ||40|| MoT_2,17.
     nirvāṇākhyaṃ prakaraṇaṃ tataḥ ṣaṣṭham udāhṛtam /
     śiṣṭo granthaḥ parīmāṇaṃ tasya jñeyaṃ mahārthadam // Mo_2,17.41 //
"tataḥ" upaśāntiprakaraṇānantaraṃ | "śiṣṭaḥ granthaḥ" sārdhaṣoḍaśasahasrāṇi "parīmāṇam" ||41|| MoT_2,17.
nanu kiṃ tacchravaṇena setsyatīty | atrāha
     buddhe tasmin bhavec chrotā nirvāṇaḥ śāntakalpanaḥ /
     acetyacitprakāśātmā vijñānātmā nirāmayaḥ // Mo_2,17.42 //
"nirvāṇaḥ" brahmaṇi līnaḥ | "vijñānātmā" śuddhajñānasvarūpaḥ | "nirāmayaḥ" dṛśyākhyāmayarahitaḥ ||42|| MoT_2,17.
     paramākāśakośācchaḥ śāntasarvabhavabhramaḥ /
     nirvāhitajagadyātraḥ kṛtakartavyasusthitaḥ // Mo_2,17.43 //
"nirvāhitā" avasānaṃ nītā "jagadyātrā" yena saḥ | tādṛśaḥ | "kṛtaṃ" samāptaṃ | kartavyaṃ yena "kṛtakartavyaḥ" | tādṛśaś cāsāv | ata eva "susthitaś" ca ||43|| MoT_2,17.
     samastavitatārambhavajrastambho nabhonibhaḥ /
     vinigīrṇayathāsaṃsthajagajjālātitṛptimān // Mo_2,17.44 //
"samastāḥ" ye "vitatārambhāḥ" | teṣu "vajrastambhaḥ" avicala ity arthaḥ | "nabhonibhaḥ" śarīrayātrārthaṃ kṛtair api karmabhir aliptatvāt ākāśasadṛśaḥ | "vinigīrṇaṃ" citsvarūpe svātmani līnīkṛtaṃ | yat "jagajjālaṃ" | ten"ātitṛptimān" nirapekṣa ity arthaḥ ||44|| MoT_2,17.
     ākāśībhūtaniḥśeṣarūpālokamanaskṛtiḥ /
     kāryakāraṇakartṛtvaheyādeyadaśojjhitaḥ // Mo_2,17.45 //
"rūpam" viṣayaḥ | "ālokaḥ" tadgrahaṇopāyaḥ | "manaskṛtiḥ" manaskāraḥ | ālokena gṛhītasya rūpasya manasi anusandhānam iti yāvat ||45|| MoT_2,17.
     sadeha eva nirdehaḥ sasaṃsāro 'py asaṃsṛtiḥ /
     cinmayo //hanapāṣāṇajaṭharajaṭharopamaḥ // Mo_2,17.46 ||
"sadehaḥ" sattvaśeṣaṃ tāvat śarīrasya sthitatvāt | "nirdehaḥ" śarīre 'bhimānābhāvāt | "cinmayaḥ" citsvarūpa aham iti niścayāt | "ghanapāṣāṇasya" yat "jaṭharam" | tasya yat "jaṭharam" | ten"opamā" yasya saḥ | tādṛśaḥ acetyacinmayatvāt || MoT_2,17.46 ||



     cidādityas tapaṃl loke 'py andhakārodaropamaḥ /
     paraprakāśarūpo 'pi param āndhyam ivāgataḥ // Mo_2,17.47 //
"cidādityaḥ" cidādityasvarūpaḥ | ata eva "loke tapann api" | na hi citsparśarahitaḥ kaścit bhāvaḥ saṃbhavati | sattve 'pi tasya asaṃkalpatvaprasaṅgāt | "andhakārodaropamaḥ" andhakārasya yat udaraṃ | tenopamā yasya | tādṛśaḥ padārthavibhāgarahitatvāt | na hi andhakārodare padārthavibhāgaḥ bhavati | "paraprakāśarūpo 'pi" uttīrṇacitprakāśarūpo 'pi | "param āndhyam" "āgataḥ iva" na kiṃciddraṣṭṛtvāt || MoT_2,17.47 ||



     ruddhasaṃsṛtidurlīlaḥ prakṣīṇāśāviṣūcikāḥ /
     naṣṭāhaṃkāravetālo dehavān akalevaraḥ // Mo_2,17.48 //
spaṣṭam || MoT_2,17.48 ||


     kasmiṃścid romakoṭyagre tasyeyam avatiṣṭhate /
     jagallakṣmīr mahāmeroḥ puṣpe kvacid ivālinī // Mo_2,17.49 //
"kaśmiṃscit" atisūkṣmatayā vaktum aśakye "svapnavad" iti śeṣaḥ | svapne hi puruṣasya kasmiṃścid aṃśe svapnajagad "avatiṣṭhate" || MoT_2,17.49 ||


     paramāṇau paramāṇau cidākāśasya koṭare /
     jagallakṣmīsahasrāṇi dhatte kṛtvā ca paśyati // Mo_2,17.50 //
"cidākāśasya" svarūpabhūtasya cinmātrākāśasya | "koṭare" madhye sthite | "paramāṇau paramāṇau jagallakṣmīsahasrāṇi kṛtvā dhatte" dhārayati | na kevalaṃ dhatte | kiṃ tu sākṣitayā sthitatvāt "paśyati ca" || MoT_2,17.50 ||


nanu katham asau jagallakṣmīsahasrāṇy antarvartayatīty | atra sargāntaślokenāha
          pravitatā hṛdayasya mahāmate
          hariharābjajalakṣaśatair api /
          tulanam eti na muktimato bata
          pravitatāsti na nūnam avastunaḥ // Mo_2,17.51 //
"bata" niścaye | he "mahāmate" | "muktimataḥ" nirvāṇaprakaraṇaśravaṇadvāreṇa muktiyuktasya puruṣasya | "hṛdayasya pravitataḥ" bhāvapradhāno nirdeśaḥ | tena "hṛdayasya pravitate"ti arthaḥ | sā "hariharābjajalakṣaśatair api tulanaṃ" māpanaviṣayatāṃ "na eti" | yataḥ "avastunaḥ" avastubhūtasya hariharābjādirūpasya bhāvavṛndasya "pravitatā" | "nūnaṃ" niścaye | "nāsti" | na cāvastunā vastumāpanaṃ yuktaṃ | tathā ca noktadeśaprasaṅga iti bhāvaḥ | iti śivam || MoT_2,17.51 ||




iti śrībhāskarakaṇṭhaviracitāyāṃ śrīmokṣopāyaṭīkāyāṃ mumukṣuprakaraṇe saptadaśaḥ sargaḥ || 2,17 ||


************************************************************************

oṃ śrotṛpravṛttyarthaṃ svena kriyamāṇasya granthasyānyavilakṣaṇatvena samyagjñānaṃ prati paropāyatvaṃ kathayati
     asyāṃ vācitamātrāyāṃ paro bodhaḥ pravartate /
     bījād iva yato vyuptād avaśyaṃbhāvi satphalam // Mo_2,18.1 //
"asyāṃ" mokṣopāyābhidhāyāṃ saṃhitāyāṃ | "bodhaḥ" kaḥ | "yataḥ" yasmāt bodhāt | "satphalaṃ" mokṣākhyaṃ śubhaṃ phalam | "avaśyaṃbhāvi" bhavati | kasmād iva | "vyuptād bījād iva" || MoT_2,18.1 ||


nanu mahāmunipraṇītāni śāstrāntarāṇi tyaktvā kim iti idam eva śāstraṃ gṛhṇāmīty | atrāha
     api pauruṣam ādeyaṃ śāstraṃ ced yuktibodhakam /
     anyat tv ārṣam api tyājyaṃ bhāvyaṃ nyāyaikasevinā // Mo_2,18.2 //
"pauruṣam" puruṣanirmitam | "ādeyaṃ" grahītavyaṃ | "yuktibodhakam" sattarkabodhakam | "anyat" yuktyabodhakam | "ārṣam" ṛṣinirmitam | atra ca pratibhānvitaiḥ kaścid abhiprāyo boddhavyaḥ yo 'smābhiḥ ārambha eva pratibhāvatāṃ svayaṃ jñeyatvena tadrahitānām akathanīyatvena coktaḥ || MoT_2,18.2 ||



     yuktiyuktam upādeyaṃ vacanaṃ bālakād api /
     anyat tṛṇam iva tyājyam apy uktaṃ padmajanmanā // Mo_2,18.3 //
atrāpi pratibhāvadbhiḥ ārambhe svayaṃ jñeyatvenokto 'rthaḥ svayaṃ boddhavyaḥ | na ca tadbodhenāsmiñ śāstre anādaraḥ kāryaḥ pratibhāvattvahāneḥ | evam uttaratrāpi yatra tatra svayam abhyūhyam || MoT_2,18.3 ||


punar apy etad eva bhaṅgyantareṇa kathayati
     yo 'mbhas tātasya kūpo 'yam iti kaupaṃ pibet kaṭu /
     tyaktvā gāṅgaṃ puraḥsthaṃ taṃ ko 'nuśāsati rāgiṇam // Mo_2,18.4 //
"yaḥ" puruṣaḥ | "puraḥsthaṃ gāṅgaṃ" toyaṃ "tyaktvā" | "ayaṃ kūpaḥ tātasya" nijasya pituḥ bhavati | "iti" etadarthaṃ | "kaupaṃ" kūpasambandhi | "kaṭu ambhaḥ pibet" | "tam" anu"rāgiṇaṃ" pitṛviṣayarāgākhyadoṣayuktaṃ | "kaḥ anuśāsati" upadiśati | nāsāv upadeśārhaḥ iti bhāvaḥ | ayam atrābhiprāyaḥ | "yaḥ" puruṣaḥ | sadyuktiyuktam "api pauruṣaṃ" vacanaṃ | "pauruṣeyam idam" iti tyajati | tadrahitam api "ārṣaṃ" vacanaṃ | "ārṣam" ity etāvanmātreṇa gṛhṇāti | tasyopadeśo na kāryaḥ iti || MoT_2,18.4 ||



prakṛtam evānusarati
     yathoṣasi pravṛttāyām āloko 'vaśyam eṣyati /
     asyāṃ vācitamātrāyāṃ svavivekas tathaiṣyati // Mo_2,18.5 //
"uṣasī"ty ārṣaṃ strītvam | "svavivekaḥ" ātmavivekaḥ || MoT_2,18.5 ||


     śrutāyāṃ prājñavadanād buddhāyāṃ svayam eva vā /
     śanaiḥ śanair vicāreṇa buddhau saṃskāra āgate // Mo_2,18.6 //
     pūrvaṃ tāvad udety antar bhṛśaṃ saṃskṛtavākyatā /
     śuddhā muktā latevoccair yā sabhāsthānabhūṣaṇam // Mo_2,18.7 //
spaṣṭam || MoT_2,18.6-7 ||


nanu viraktasya mama kiṃ saṃskṛtavākyatayā prayojanam ity | atrāha
     parā virāgatodeti mahattvaguṇaśālinī /
     sā yayā sneham āyānti rājāno 'jagarā api // Mo_2,18.8 //
virakteṣu hi "ajagara"tulyāḥ "rājāno 'pi sneham āyānti" || MoT_2,18.8 ||


     pūrvāparajñaḥ sarvatra naro bhavati buddhimān /
     padārthānāṃ yathā dīpahasto niśi sulocanaḥ // Mo_2,18.9 //
"sarvatra" sarveṣu vyavahāreṣu || MoT_2,18.9 ||


     lobhamohādayo doṣās tānavaṃ yānty alaṃ śanaiḥ /
     dhiyo diśaḥ samāsannaśarado mihikā yathā // Mo_2,18.10 //
"lobhamohādayaḥ" kāḥ | "yathā mihikāḥ" "samāsannaśaradaḥ" pratyāsannaśaratkālāyāḥ "diśaḥ tānavaṃ yānti" | tathety arthaḥ || MoT_2,18.10 ||



     kevalaṃ samapekṣante vivekābhyasanaṃ dhiyaḥ /
     na kācana phalaṃ dhatte svabhyāsena vinā kriyā // Mo_2,18.11 //
nanu kimarthaṃ "vivekābhyāsam apekṣante" ity | atrāha | "na kācane"ti || MoT_2,18.11 ||


     manaḥ prasādam āyāti śaradīva mahat saraḥ /
     paraṃ sāmyam upādhatte nirmandara ivārṇavaḥ // Mo_2,18.12 //
"prasādaṃ" rāgādimalarahitatvāt nairmalyam | "param" niratiśayam | "sāmyaṃ" samatākhyaṃ guṇam | "upādhatte" dhārayati | atrāpi manasa eva kartṛtvam || MoT_2,18.12 ||


     nirastakālimā vajraśikhevāstatamaḥpaṭā /
     parijvalaty alaṃ prajñā padārthapravibhāginī // Mo_2,18.13 //
"nirastaḥ" dūre gataḥ | "kālimā" kāluṣaṃ | yasyāḥ sā || MoT_2,18.13 ||


     dainyadāridryadoṣādyā dṛṣṭayo darśitāntarāḥ /
     na nikṛntanti marmāṇi sasaṃnāham iveṣavaḥ // Mo_2,18.14 //
"darśitaṃ" vivecitaṃ | antaram sārākhyaḥ "āntaraḥ" bhāgaḥ yāsāṃ tāḥ | niḥsāratvena jñātā ity arthaḥ || MoT_2,18.14 ||


     hṛdayaṃ nāvalumpanti bhīmāḥ saṃsṛtibhītayaḥ /
     puraḥsthitam api prājñaṃ mahopalam ivākhavaḥ // Mo_2,18.15 //
"hṛdayaṃ" kathaṃbhūtam "api" | "puraḥsthitam api" agre sthitam api | punaḥ kathaṃbhūtam | "prājñam" || MoT_2,18.15 ||


     kathaṃ syād āditā janmakarmaṇor daivapuṃstvayoḥ /
     ityādisaṃśayagaṇaḥ śāmyaty ahni yathā tamaḥ // Mo_2,18.16 //
"daivapuṃstvayoḥ" daivapauruṣayoḥ | "āditā" kāraṇatvam || MoT_2,18.16 ||


     sarvathā sarvabhāveṣu saṃgatir upaśāmyati /
     yāminyām iva yātāyāṃ prajñāloka upāgate // Mo_2,18.17 //
"sarvabhāveṣu" tyāgādānārheṣu samasteṣu padārtheṣu | "sarvathā saṃgatiḥ" tyāgādānārūpā sambandhaḥ "upaśāmyati" | kasmin sati | "pra"ti"jñāloka upāgate" sati | kadeva | "yāminyāṃ" rātrau "yātāyām iva" satyām | upekṣā eva sarvatrāyātīti bhāvaḥ || MoT_2,18.17 ||


     samudrasyeva gāmbhīryaṃ sthairyaṃ meror iva sthitam /
     antaḥśītalatā cendor ivodeti vicāriṇaḥ // Mo_2,18.18 //
spaṣṭam || MoT_2,18.18 ||


     sā jīvanmuktatā tasya śanaiḥ pariṇatiṃ gatā /
     śāntāśeṣavikalpasya bhavaty āviśya yoginaḥ // Mo_2,18.19 //
"sā" prasiddhā | "āviśya" āveśaṃ kṛtvā || MoT_2,18.19 ||



     sarvārthaśītalā śuddhā paramālokadā sudhīḥ /
     paraṃ prakāśam āyāti jyotsneva sakalaindavī // Mo_2,18.20 //
"sarvārtheṣu" bhāvābhāvayukteṣu samasteṣu pad"ārtheṣu" | "śītalā" harṣāmarṣākhyatāparahitā | "śuddhā" rāgādirahitā | "paramālokaṃ" cinmātrālokaṃ "dadhātī"ti tādṛśī | śobhanā cāsau dhīḥ "sudhīḥ" | "aindavī" indusambandhinī || MoT_2,18.20 ||


     hṛdyākāśe vivekārke śamālokini nirmale |
     anarthasārthakartāro nodyanti kaliketavaḥ || MoT_2,18.21 ||


"śama" eva "ālokaḥ" asyāstīti tādṛśe | "kaleḥ" kalahasya kṣobhasya | "ketavaḥ" cihnabhūtāḥ rāgādayo doṣāḥ | sūryodaye ca "ketavaḥ" dhūmaketavaḥ "nodyanti" || MoT_2,18.21 ||


     śāmyanti śuddhim āyānti saumyās tiṣṭhanti sūnnate /
     acañcalajaḍās tṛṣṇāḥ śaradīvābhramālikāḥ // Mo_2,18.22 //
na cañcalajaḍāḥ "acañcalajaḍāḥ" || MoT_2,18.22 ||


     yatkiṃcanakarī krūrā grāmyatā vinivartate /
     dīnānanā piśācānāṃ līleva divasāgame // Mo_2,18.23 //
"yatkiṃcanakarī" ayuktakāriṇī | "grāmyatayā" hi puruṣaḥ yatkiṃcid eva karoti || MoT_2,18.23 ||



     dharmabhittau bhṛśaṃ lagnāṃ dhiyaṃ dhairyadhuraṃ gatām /
     ādhayo na vilumpanti vātāś citralatām iva // Mo_2,18.24 //
"dharma" eva "bhittiḥ" | tasyāṃ "lagnāṃ" | ata eva "dhairyadhuraṃ gatām" dhairyayuktām iti yāvat | dharmayukto hi dhīro bhavati | citrarūpā latā "citralatā" | tām || MoT_2,18.24 ||



     na pataty avaṭe jantur viṣayāsaṅgarūpiṇi /
     kaḥ kila jñātasaraṇiḥ śvabhre samanudhāvati // Mo_2,18.25 //
"viṣayāsaṅgarūpiṇi" bhogāsaktirūpe | etad eva uttarārdhena samarthayati | "kaḥ kile"ti || MoT_2,18.25 ||



     sacchāstrasādhuvṛttānām avirodhini karmaṇi /
     ramate dhīr yathāprāpte sādhvīvāntaḥpurājire // Mo_2,18.26 //
"sacchāstreṇa" mokṣopāyākhyasacchāstrāvagāhanena "sādhuvṛttaṃ" caritaṃ yeṣāṃ te | tādṛśānāṃ | "yathāprāpte" pravāhāgate | na tu yatnād ṛte || MoT_2,18.26 ||


     jagatāṃ koṭilakṣyeṣu yāvantaḥ paramāṇavaḥ /
     teṣām ekaikaśo 'ntaḥsthān sargān paśyaty asargadhīḥ // Mo_2,18.27 //
"asargā dhīḥ" yasya saḥ | āścaryaṃ cāsargadhiyaḥ paramāṇau paramāṇau sargadarśanam | sargabījabhūtacinmātravyāptijñānena paramāṇau paramāṇau sargadarśanaṃ jñeyam || MoT_2,18.27 ||


     mokṣopāyāvabodhena śuddhāntaḥkaraṇaṃ janam /
     na khedayati bhogaugho na cānandayati kvacit // Mo_2,18.28 //
bhogeṣūpekṣām evāsau bhajate iti bhāvaḥ || MoT_2,18.28 ||

     paramāṇau paramāṇau sargavargā nirargalam /
     ye patanty utpatanty ambuvīcivat tān sa paśyati // Mo_2,18.29 //
"patanti" līnā bhavanti | "utpatanti" prādurbhavanti || MoT_2,18.29 ||

     na dveṣṭi saṃpravṛttāni na nivṛttāni kāṅkṣati /
     kāryāṇy eṣa prabuddho 'pi niṣprabuddha iva drumaḥ // Mo_2,18.30 //
abuddhatvam asya svātmani "niṣprabuddhatvaṃ" saṃsāre jñeyam || MoT_2,18.30 ||


nanu kīdṛg atiśayo 'sya syād ity | atrāha
     dṛśyate lokasāmānyo yathāprāptānuvṛttimān /
     iṣṭāniṣṭaphalaprāptau hṛdaye na parājitaḥ // Mo_2,18.31 //
"lokasāmānyaḥ" na tv atiśayavān | "yathāprāpte" pravāhāgate | "anuvṛttiḥ" anuvartanaṃ | vidyate yasya | saḥ "yathāprāptānuvṛttimān" | "hṛdaye" manasi | "na parājitaḥ" harṣāmarṣāvaśībhūtaḥ || MoT_2,18.31 ||



     buddhvedam akhilaṃ śāstraṃ vācayitvā vivecya vā /
     anubhūyata evaitan na tūktaṃ varaśāpavat // Mo_2,18.32 //
yuṣmābhiḥ "etat" pūrvoktaṃ phalaṃ "anubhūyata eva" | nanu pratyavāyaśaṅkayā katham etadanubhave śaktā bhavāma ity apekṣāyām āha | "na tūktam" iti | "mantrādivad" iti śeṣaḥ || MoT_2,18.32 ||


nanu durbodhe 'smin kathaṃ pravṛttiṃ kurma ity | atrāha
     śāstraṃ subodham evedaṃ nānālaṃkārabhūṣitam /
     kāvyaṃ rasaghanaṃ cāru dṛṣṭāntaiḥ pratipādakam // Mo_2,18.33 //
"dṛṣṭāntaiḥ pratipādakam" iti subodhatve viśeṣaṇadvāreṇa hetuḥ || MoT_2,18.33 ||


     budhyate svayam evedaṃ kiṃcitpadapadārthavit /
     svayaṃ yas tu na vettīdaṃ śrotavyaṃ tena paṇḍitāt // Mo_2,18.34 //
"budhyate" jānāti | nanu yasya padapadārthavittvaṃ nāsti tasya kiṃ kāryam ity | atrāha "svayam" iti || MoT_2,18.34 ||



nanv etacchravaṇena kiṃ setsyatīty | atrāha
     asmiñ śrute mate jñāte tapodhyānajapādikam /
     mokṣaprāptau tu tasyeha na kiṃcid upayujyate // Mo_2,18.35 //
"śrute" śravaṇaviṣayatāṃ nīte | "mate" mananaviṣayatāṃ nīte | "jñāte" nidadhyāsite | "tasya" śravaṇādau pravṛttasya || MoT_2,18.35 ||


     etacchāstraghanābhyāsāt paunaḥpunyena vīkṣitāt /
     jantoḥ pāṇḍityapūrvaṃ hi cittasaṃskārapūrvakam // Mo_2,18.36 //
     ahaṃ jagad iti prauḍho draṣṭṛdṛśyapiśācakaḥ /
     piśāco 'rkodayeneva svayaṃ śāmyaty avighnataḥ // Mo_2,18.37 //
etena bāhyam api prayojanam āntaram api ca setsyatīti kathitam || MoT_2,18.36-37 ||



     bhramo jagad ahaṃ ceti sthita evopaśāmyati /
     svapnamohaḥ parijñāta iva no ramayaty alam // Mo_2,18.38 //
"sthita eva" | na tu mantrādiprayogavaśenāntarbhūtiṃ gataḥ | nanu sthitasyopaśamanaṃ katham ity | atrāha | "svapnamoha" iti | arasakasya sthitasyāpi śāntir eva jñeyā kṣobhakāritvābhāvāt iti bhāvaḥ || MoT_2,18.38 ||


     yathā saṃkalpanagare puṃso harṣaviṣāditā /
     na bādhate tathaivāntaḥ parijñāte jagadbhrame // Mo_2,18.39 //
"antaḥ" manasi | "parijñāte" samyak niścite | "harṣaviṣāditā na bādhate" iti "tathā"śabdenānukṛṣyate || MoT_2,18.39 ||


     citrasarpaḥ parijñāto na sarpabhayado yathā /
     dṛśyasarpaḥ parijñātas tathā na sukhaduḥkhadaḥ // Mo_2,18.40 //
"parijñātaḥ citrasarpo" 'yam iti samyaṅ niścitaḥ | dṛśyākhyaḥ sarpaḥ "dṛśyasarpaḥ" || MoT_2,18.40 ||


     parijñānena sarpatvaṃ citrasarpasya naśyati /
     yathā tathaiva saṃsāraḥ sthita evopaśāmyati // Mo_2,18.41 //
spaṣṭam || MoT_2,18.41 ||


nanu paramārthaprāptir asmākam atiduṣkaraiva | tathā ca tatprāptyartham etacchāstrāvagāhanam ayuktam evety | atrāha
     sumanaḥpallavāmarśe kiṃcidvyatikaro bhavet /
     paramārthapadaprāptau na tu vyatikaro 'sti naḥ // Mo_2,18.42 //
"sumanaḥpallavāmarśe" puṣpapallavāmarde | "vyatikaraḥ" yatnaḥ | "naḥ" yuktijñānām asmākam | na tv ayuktijñānāṃ bhavatām ity arthaḥ || MoT_2,18.42 ||



vyatikarābhāvam eva kathayati
     gacchaty avayavaspandaḥ sumanaḥpatramardane /
     iha dhīmātrabodhas tu nāṅgāvayavabodhanam // Mo_2,18.43 //
"gacchati" upayukto bhavati | anekārthatvād dhātūnāṃ "gacchatir" atrāsminn arthe vartate | "aṅgāvayavānāṃ" śarīrāvayavānām | "bodhanam" cālanam || MoT_2,18.43 ||


     sukhāsanopaviṣṭena yathāsambhavam aśnatā /
     bhogajālaṃ sadācāraviruddheṣu na tiṣṭhatā // Mo_2,18.44 //
     yathākṣaṇaṃ yathādeśaṃ pravicārayatā sukham /
     yathāsambhavasatsaṅgam idaṃ śāstram athetarat // Mo_2,18.45 //
     āsādyate mahājñānabodhaḥ saṃsāraśāntidaḥ /
     sa bhūyo yena nāyāti yoniyantraprapīḍanam // Mo_2,18.46 //
"yathāsambhavam" na tu prayatnasādhitam | "sadācāraviruddheṣu" tiṣṭhato hi hānopādānakāritvarūpo doṣaḥ āyātīti "na tiṣṭhate"ty uktam | "yathākṣaṇam" pratikṣaṇam | "sukham" sukhadāyi | "yathāsambhavaḥ satsaṅgo" yatra tat | "idaṃ śāstraṃ" mayā vakṣyamāṇamokṣopāyākhyam śāstraṃ | "itarat" etatsadṛśam anyacchāstraṃ vā | mahājñānarūpaḥ bodhaḥ "mahājñānabodhaḥ" | "sa" ity asya pūrvārdhena sambandhaḥ || MoT_2,18.44-46 ||



     etāvaty eva ye bhūtā bhogān prāpya rase sthitāḥ /
     svamātṛviṣṭhākrimayaḥ kīrtanīyā na te 'dhamāḥ // Mo_2,18.47 //
"etāvati rase" parimite rase | "bhūtāḥ" sāmānyajantavaḥ || MoT_2,18.47 ||


evaṃ śāstramāhātmyam uktvā śrīrāmaṃ saṃmukhīkaroti
     śṛṇu tāvad idānīṃ tvaṃ kathyamānam idaṃ mayā /
     rāghava jñānavistāraṃ buddhisāratarāntaram // Mo_2,18.48 //
"buddheḥ sārataram antaram" yasya tat | buddhyatiśāyīty arthaḥ || MoT_2,18.48 ||



madhye śrīrāmakṛtāṃś codyān āśaṅkyāha
     yayedaṃ śrūyate śāstraṃ tāṃ tu vistarataḥ śṛṇu /
     vicāryate tathārtho 'yaṃ yayā ca paribhāṣayā // Mo_2,18.49 //
"yayā paribhāṣayā" yuktyā | "idaṃ śāstraṃ śrūyate" | tvaṃ "tāṃ vistarataḥ śṛṇu" | "tathā" "yayā ca vicāryate" | tāṃ ca śṛṇv iti pūrveṇa sambandhaḥ || MoT_2,18.49 ||


paribhāṣām eva kathayati
     yenehānanubhūte 'rthe dṛṣṭenārthāvabodhanam /
     bodhopakāraphaladaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭāntaṃ vidur budhāḥ // Mo_2,18.50 //
"yena dṛṣṭenā"rthena | "ananubhūte arthe arthāvabodhanam" jñānam bhavati | "budhāḥ tam dṛṣṭāntam āhuḥ" | kathaṃbhūtaṃ | "bodhā"khyaḥ ya "upakāraḥ" | tad eva "phalaṃ" | tad "dadhātī"ti tādṛśam || MoT_2,18.50 ||



dṛṣṭāntadāne kiṃ phalam ity | atrāha
     dṛṣṭāntena vinā rāma nāpūrvo 'rtho 'vabudhyate /
     yathā dīpaṃ vinā rātrau bhāṇḍopakaraṇaṃ gṛhe // Mo_2,18.51 //
"bhāṇḍopakaraṇaṃ" bhāṇḍasāmagrī || MoT_2,18.51 ||


     yair yaiḥ kākutstha dṛṣṭāntais tvaṃ mayehāvabudhyase /
     sarve sakāraṇās te hi prāpyaṃ tu sad akāraṇam // Mo_2,18.52 //
"prāpyam" prāpaṇīyaṃ | "sat" sanmātrākhyaṃ vastu || MoT_2,18.52 ||



nanu sarvāṇi dārṣṭāntikāni etādṛśāni eva santy utānyāny athety apekṣāyām āha
     upamānopameyānāṃ kāryakāraṇatoditā /
     varjayitvā paraṃ brahma sarveṣām eva vidyate // Mo_2,18.53 //
dṛṣṭāntadārṣṭāntikānām "paraṃ brahma varjayitvā" | "uditā" udayanaśīlā | "kāryakāraṇatā vidyate" | brahma na kāryam asti nāpi kāraṇam ity arthaḥ | ato na brahmasadṛśāni sarvāṇi dārṣṭāntikāni iti bhāvaḥ || MoT_2,18.53 ||



phalitaṃ kathayati
     brahmopadeśadṛṣṭānto yasya veha hi kathyate /
     ekadeśasadharmatvaṃ tatrātaḥ parigṛhyate // Mo_2,18.54 //
"hi" niścaye | "ataḥ" kāraṇāt | "iha" loke | "yasya vā brahmopadeśadṛṣṭāntaḥ kathyate tatra" brahmadṛṣṭānte | "ekadeśasadharmatvaṃ" ekadeśasadṛśatvaṃ | "parigṛhyate" | na tu sarvathā sadṛśatvam dārṣṭāntikasya brahmaṇaḥ kāryakāraṇatvāyogyāt | dṛṣṭāntasya tu kāryatayā kāraṇatayā ca sthitatvād iti bhāvaḥ || MoT_2,18.54 ||



     yo yo nāmeha dṛṣṭānto brahmatattvāvabodhane /
     dīyate sa sa boddhavyaḥ svapnadṛṣṭajagadgataḥ // Mo_2,18.55 //
"svapnadṛṣṭajagadgataḥ" bhramarūpaḥ ity arthaḥ || MoT_2,18.55 ||



phalitam āha
     evaṃ sati nirākāre brahmaṇy ākāravān katham /
     dṛṣṭānta iti nodyanti mūrkhavaikalpikoktayaḥ // Mo_2,18.56 //
"nodyanti" nottiṣṭhanti | asmābhir ata eva pratyuktatvād iti bhāvaḥ || MoT_2,18.56 ||



     anyā siddhaviruddhādidṛk dṛṣṭāntapradūṣaṇe /
     svapnopamatvāj jagataḥ samudeti na kācana // Mo_2,18.57 //
"anyā" pūrvoktāyāḥ dṛṣṭeḥ sakāśāt itarā kā | "na kā"pi | "siddhaviruddhādidṛk" idaṃ siddhaṃ idaṃ viruddham ityādirūpā uktiḥ | "jagataḥ svapnopamatvāt dṛṣṭāntapradūṣaṇe" dṛṣṭāntapradūṣaṇārtham "na samudeti" | "ādi"śabdenedaṃ leśena siddhaṃ viruddhaṃ veti dṛṣṭer grahaṇam | svapnopame jagati idaṃ siddhaṃ idam viruddham iti | kathanaṃ na yuktaṃ sarvasyāyuktatvād iti bhāvaḥ || MoT_2,18.57 ||



     avastu pūrvāparayor vartamānavicāritaṃ /
     yathā jāgrat tathā svapnaḥ siddham ābālam akṣatam // Mo_2,18.58 //
"pūrvāparayoḥ" bhūtabhaviṣyator arthayoḥ | "avastu" bhāvapradhāno nirdeśaḥ | "avastutvam" asattvam "vartamānavicāritaṃ" bhavati | vartamāne hi bhūtasya gatatvāt bhaviṣyataḥ anāgatatvāt asattvaṃ vicārapadavīm āyāti | tadabhinnasya vartamānasyāpi avastutvam aparihāryam eveti svayam eva jñeyam | ataḥ "ābālam" bālaparyantaṃ | "yathā svapnaḥ tathā jāgrad" iti | "akṣataṃ" samyak | "siddham" bhavati || MoT_2,18.58 ||



     svapnasaṃkalpanadhyānavaraśāpauṣadhādibhiḥ /
     ye 'rthās ta iha dṛṣṭāntās tadrūpatvāj jagatsthiteḥ // Mo_2,18.59 //
"ye 'rthā" ity | atra "dṛṣṭā" iti śeṣaḥ | "tadrūpatvāt" svapnādyartharūpatvāt | ata "ihā"satyaiḥ padārthaiḥ satyasya brahmaṇaḥ upamānopameyabhāvaḥ ekadeśasādharmyeṇeti bhāvaḥ || MoT_2,18.59 ||



nanu tvayā kṛteṣv anyeṣu grantheṣu kā vārtety | atrāha
     mokṣopāyakṛtā granthakāreṇānye 'pi ye kṛtāḥ /
     granthās teṣv iyam evaikā vyavasthā bodhyabodhane // Mo_2,18.60 //
"mokṣopāyakṛtā granthakāreṇa" mayety arthaḥ | "bodhyasya" bodhanīyasya brahmatattvasya | "bodhane" kathane | "vyavasthā" rītiḥ || MoT_2,18.60 ||



nanu kathaṃ svapnasadṛśatvaṃ jagato 'stīty | atrāha
     svapnābhatvaṃ ca jagataḥ śrute śāstre 'vabhotsyate /
     śīghraṃ na pāryate vaktuṃ vāk kila kramavartinī // Mo_2,18.61 //
"avabhotsyate" jñātuṃ śakyate | tarhi yugapad eva sarvaṃ śāstraṃ kathayety | atrāha | "śīghram" iti | "vācaḥ kramavartitvaṃ" sphuṭam eva | "na" hi ekaṃ vākyam anirvāhya dvitīyādikaṃ vākyaṃ "vaktuṃ" śakyate || MoT_2,18.61 ||



     svapnasaṃkalpasudhyānanagarādyupamaṃ jagat /
     yatas ta eva dṛṣṭāntās tasmād bhāntīha netare // Mo_2,18.62 //
"yataḥ jagat" | "svapnasaṃkalpasudhyāneṣu" dṛṣṭāḥ ye "nagarādayaḥ" | teṣāṃ "upamā" yasya | tādṛśaṃ bhavati | "tasmāt ta eva sudhyānanagarādaya" eva "dṛṣṭāntāḥ bhānti" asmākaṃ buddhau sphuranti | "itare" satyabhūtāḥ nagarādayaḥ | "na" bhānti ayuktatvāt || MoT_2,18.62 ||



     akāraṇaṃ kāraṇinā yad bodhāyopamīyate /
     na tatra sarvasādharmyaṃ sambhavaty upamābhramaiḥ // Mo_2,18.63 //
"akāraṇaṃ" kāraṇarahitaṃ brahma | "kāraṇinā" kāraṇayuktenākāśādinā | "upamābhramaiḥ" anyopamādṛṣṭasarvathāsādharmyarūpaiḥ viparyayaiḥ || MoT_2,18.63 ||


     upameyasyopamānād ekāṃśena sadharmatā /
     aṅgīkāryāvabodhāya dhīmatā nirvivādinā // Mo_2,18.64 //
"dhīmatā" na tv adhīmatā | sa hi ārambha eva vivādapara eva tiṣṭhatīti bhāvaḥ || MoT_2,18.64 ||


nanv ekena dharmeṇa sadṛśena upamānaṃ katham upameyasya pratītiṃ kartuṃ śaknotīty | atra dṛṣṭāntaṃ sādhayati
     arthāvalokane dīpād ābhāmātrād ṛte kila /
     na sthālatailavartyādi kiṃcid apy upajāyate // Mo_2,18.65 //
"ābhāmātrāt" prakāśamātrarūpāt | "sthālam" pātram || MoT_2,18.65 ||



etad eva dārṣṭāntikayuktaṃ kathayati
     ekadeśasadharmatvād upameyāvabodhanam /
     upamānaṃ karoty aṅga dīpo 'rthaṃ prabhayā yathā // Mo_2,18.66 //
"prabhayā" prabhākhyenaikadeśena || MoT_2,18.66 ||


     dṛṣṭāntasyāṃśamātreṇa bodhyabodhodaye sati /
     upādeyatayā grāhyo mahāvākyārthaniścayaḥ // Mo_2,18.67 //
na tu dṛṣṭāntamātra eva sthātavyam iti bhāvaḥ || MoT_2,18.67 ||


     na kutārkikatām etya nāśanīyā prabuddhatā /
     anubhūtyapalāpāttair apavitrair vikalpitaiḥ // Mo_2,18.68 //
"prabuddhatā" jñānitā | "kutārkikāḥ" hi ārambha eva codyān dattvā prabuddhatāṃ nāśayanti | "vikalpitaiḥ" kathaṃbhūtaiḥ | "anubhūte" yaḥ "apalāpaḥ" nihnavaḥ | tena "āttaiḥ" gṛhītaiḥ || MoT_2,18.68 ||


nanu purāṇāni śāstrāṇi ca tyaktvā kimarthaṃ tvaduktaṃ śāstraṃ gṛhṇīmaḥ ity | atrāha
          vicāraṇād anubhavakāri vāṅmaya-
          prasaṅgatām upagatam asmadādiṣu /
          striyoktam apy aparam athāpi vaidikaṃ
          vaco vacaḥpralapanam eva nāgamaḥ // Mo_2,18.69 //
"asmadādiṣu" prāmāṇikeṣu | "striyā uktam api" strīkartṛkaṃ pralapitam api | "vāṅmayaprasaṅgatām" śāstraprasaṅgatām | śāstratvam iti yāvat | "upagatam" | kathaṃbhūtaṃ tat | "vicāraṇāt anubhavakāri" | "atha" pakṣāntare | "vaidikaṃ vacaḥ api vacaḥpralapanam eva" pralāpa eva bhavati | "nāgamaḥ" bhavati anubhavakāritvābhāvād ity arthaḥ || MoT_2,18.69 ||


sargāntaślokenāpy etad eva kathayati
          asmākam asti matir aṅga tayeti sarva-
          śāstraikavākyakaraṇaṃ phalitaṃ yato 'taḥ /
          prātītikārthamayaśāstranijāṅgapuṣṭāt
          saṃvedanād itarad asti na naḥ pramāṇam // Mo_2,18.70 //
he "aṅga" | "asmākaṃ matir asti iti" | "ataḥ" hetoḥ | "asmākaṃ tayā" buddhyā | "sarvaśāstraikavākyakaraṇaṃ yataḥ phalitam" | "ataḥ" hetoḥ | "naḥ" asmākaṃ | "saṃvedanāt" jñānāt | anyat "pramāṇaṃ nāsti" | sarvasmiñ śāstre saṃvedanam evāsmābhiḥ pramāṇaṃ dṛṣṭam | ato 'smākam api tad eva pramāṇam iti bhāvaḥ | "saṃvedanāt" kathaṃbhūtāt | "prātītikaḥ" pratīter āgataḥ | na tu kalpitaḥ | yaḥ "arthaḥ" | tan"mayam" yat "śāstraṃ" | tad eva "nijāṅgam" upakārakatvāt svāṅgaṃ | tena "puṣṭāt" vṛddhiṃ gatāt || MoT_2,18.70 ||




iti śrībhāskarakaṇṭhaviracitāyāṃ śrīmokṣopāyaṭīkāyāṃ mumukṣuprakaraṇe aṣṭādaśaḥ sargaḥ || 2,18 ||


************************************************************************

oṃ pūrvoktam evārthaṃ punar api spaṣṭayati
     viśiṣṭāṃśasadharmatvam upamāneṣu gṛhyate /
     ko bhedaḥ sarvasādṛśye tūpamānopameyayoḥ // Mo_2,19.1 //
"viśiṣṭāṃśena" kāryasādhakenāṃśena | "sādharmyaṃ" sādṛśyam | ekāṃśenāpi kāryasya siddhatvān na ko 'pīty arthaḥ || MoT_2,19.1 ||


     dṛṣṭāntabuddhād ekātmajñānaśāstrārthavedanāt /
     mahāvākyārthasaṃvittyā śāntir nirvāṇam ucyate // Mo_2,19.2 //
"ekam" kevalam | "ātmajñānaṃ" pratipādyatvena yasmin | tādṛśaṃ yat "śāstraṃ" | tasya yo "'rthaḥ" | tasya "vedanāt" vicārāt | utpannayā "mahāvākyārthasaṃvittyā" | garbhīkṛtāvāntaravākyamahāvākyārthaparicchedena | siddhā "śāntiḥ" manaḥkṣobharāhityaṃ | paṇḍitaiḥ "nirvāṇam ucyate" | "vedanāt" kathaṃbhūtāt | "dṛṣṭāntaiḥ buddhāt" jñātāt siddhād iti yāvat || MoT_2,19.2 ||



upasaṃhāraṃ karoti
     tasmād dṛṣṭāntadārṣṭāntavikalpollasitair alam /
     yayā kayācid yuktyāśu mahāvākyārtham āśrayet // Mo_2,19.3 //
"alam" kṛtam | naitaiḥ prayojanam ity arthaḥ || MoT_2,19.3 ||


     śāntiḥ śreyaḥ paraṃ viddhi tatprāptau yatnavān bhavet /
     bhoktavya odanaḥ prāptaḥ kiṃ tatsiddhivikalpitaiḥ // Mo_2,19.4 //
"śāntiḥ" manovikalparūpakṣobharāhityam | "siddhivikalpitaiḥ" katham etat sampannam iti vikalpaiḥ || MoT_2,19.4 ||


     akāraṇaṃ kāraṇibhir bodhārtham upamīyate /
     upamānais tūpameyasadṛśair ekadeśataḥ // Mo_2,19.5 //
"akāraṇaṃ" kāraṇarahitabrahma | "ekadeśataḥ" ekena dharmeṇa || MoT_2,19.5 ||


     sthātavyaṃ neha bhogeṣu vivekavikalātmanā /
     upalodarasaṃjātaparipīnāndhabhekavat // Mo_2,19.6 //
spaṣṭam || MoT_2,19.6 ||


     dṛṣṭāntair yuktibhir yatnād vāñchitaṃ tyajatetarat /
     vicāraṇavatā bhāvyaṃ śāntiśāstrārthaśālinā // Mo_2,19.7 //
"vāñchitaṃ" abhilaṣitam | "itarat" vicāravyatiriktam | "śāntiś" ca "śāstrārthaś" ca tābhyāṃ śālate iti tādṛśena || MoT_2,19.7 ||


     śāstropaśamasaujanyaprajñātajjñasamāgamaiḥ /
     antarāntarasampannadharmyārthopārjanakriyaḥ // Mo_2,19.8 //
     tāvad vicārayet prājño yāvad viśrāntim ātmani /
     samprayāty apunarnāśāṃ śāntiṃ turyapadābhidhām // Mo_2,19.9 //
"śāstraṃ" ca "upaśamaś" ca "saujanyaṃ" ca "prajñā" ca "tajjñasamāgamaś" ca | taiḥ upalakṣitaḥ | "antarāntare" madhye madhye "sampannāḥ" | "dharmyānāṃ" dharmād anapetānāṃ "arthānām upārjanam" | tasya "kriyāḥ" yasya saḥ | tādṛśaḥ "prājñaḥ tāvat vicārayet" | "yāvat apunarnāśāṃ" pradhvaṃsābhāvarahitāṃ | "turyapadābhidhāṃ" turyapadeti nāmadheyām | "ātmani viśrāntiṃ" ātmaviśrāntilakṣaṇāṃ śāntim | "samprayāti" || MoT_2,19.8-9 ||



nanv ātmani viśrāntyā kiṃ setsyatīty | atrāha
     turyaviśrāntiyuktasya pratīrṇasya bhavārṇavāt /
     jīvato 'jīvataś caiva gṛhasthasyātha vā yateḥ // Mo_2,19.10 //
     na kṛtenākṛtenārtho na śrutismṛtivibhramaiḥ /
     nirmandara ivāṃbhodhiḥ sa tiṣṭhati yathāsthitam // Mo_2,19.11 //
"jīvataḥ" jīvanmuktasy"ājīvataḥ" videhamuktasya | "arthaḥ" prayojanam | nanu katham asau tiṣṭhatīty | atrāha | "nirmandara" iti | "saḥ" viśrāntiyuktaḥ || MoT_2,19.10-11 ||


     ekāṃśenopamānānām upameyasadharmatā /
     boddhavyā bodhyabodhāya na stheyaṃ codyacañcunā // Mo_2,19.12 //
"codyena cañcuḥ" vittaḥ | prasiddha iti yāvat | iti "codyacañcuḥ" codyaśīlenety arthaḥ || MoT_2,19.12 ||



     yayā kayācid yuktyāśu boddhavyaṃ bodhyam eva te /
     muktaye tan na paśyanti vyākulāś codyacañcavaḥ // Mo_2,19.13 //
"te" iti kartari ṣaṣṭhī | "tvām" iti śeṣaḥ | "vyākulāḥ codyacañcavaḥ" | "tat" tadā | tvām "na paśyanti" | kim utādhigacchantīti bhāvaḥ || MoT_2,19.13 ||



codyacañcoḥ lakṣaṇaṃ kathayati
     hṛdaye saṃvidākāśe viśrānte 'nubhavātmani /
     vastuny anarthaṃ yaḥ praṣṭā codyacañcuḥ sa ucyate // Mo_2,19.14 //
